sources.full_text_concat:
Vāgbhaṭa
                        Aśubodhavidyābhūṣaṇa
                        Nityabodhavidyāratna
                        Saṭīkaḥ Rasaratnasamuccayaḥ. (Prācīnarasagranthaḥ) Mahāmati śrīmad
                                Vāgbhaṭācāryyaviracitaḥ.
                                Aśubodhavidyābhūṣaṇena tathā
                                Nityabodhavidyāratnena ca viracitayā
                                Rasaratnasamuccayabodhinyākhyayā ṭīkayā samalaṅkṛtaḥ
                            prakāśitaś ca
                        Aśubodhavidyābhūṣaṇa and
                                    Nityabodhavidyāratna
                            1927
                            Kalikātā
                            This edition has been scanned and made
                                publicly available online at the Digital Library of
                                    India
                            Meulenbeld, History of Indian Medical Literature (Groningen,
                                1999-2002), IIA p.672 f. notes that "The Bodhinī is an interesting
                                and useful commentary; it gives much attention to the text of the
                                Rasaratnasamuccaya; a large number of variants and parallels are
                                discussed by the authros, who were Bengali brāhmaṇas, sons of the
                                well-known Jīvānanda Vidyāsāgara [Bhaṭṭācārya]". The Bodhinī gives
                                English language equivalents for some items, such as "ग्लस्" (glass)
                                and बोतल् (bottle) (1927 edition, p.185, on ch.7, vv.17-19)

content.value: The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration

). IAST differs
                    in small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit
                    scholars. Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the
                    following replacements throughout the file:
ṛ -> r̥ and ṃ -> ṁ
Text divison is as Devanāgarī ("ityevam" not "ity evam".)

The the text is divided in 30 chapters. Chapters 1-17 and 22 include the base text (the Rasaratnasamuccaya) 
		as well as two commentaries: Rasaratnasamuccayabodhinī and Rasaratnasamuccayaṭīkā. These were wrapped in quote-elements with the follwing attributes:
(for the sake of consistency, the base text was also wrapped in a quote-element in the chapters where the commentaries are not included),

content.value: There are two versions of chapters 17 and 22, one is based on the input by
Oliver Hellwig
, who only transcribed parts of these chapters. The other on the version was produced by
AYURYOG
. They can be distinguished by the resp-attribute of the div-element.
In chapters 17-30 (encoded by
AYURYOG
), pb-elements refer to the page numbers in the source edition.

Initial vowel elision for avagraha is reversed and marked with a + sign:
                        e.g., "prathamo+adhyāyaḥ"
Structure of references:
VRrs_nn.nn = VāgbhaṭaRasaratnasamuccaya_adhyāya.verse
VRrsBo_nn.nn;nn = Rasaratnasamuccayabodhinī (line)
VRrsṬī_nn.nn;nn = Rasaratnasamuccayaṭīkā (line)

The numbering of commentary lines includes a reference to the last
                        verse/line of the preceding mula text.
Notes added by Oliver Hellwig, and tagged as such.
Oliver Hellwig
Reinhold Gruenendahl

Tagging the distinction between
                    text and commentaries.

children.text: bhaktānāṃ prabhavaprasaṃhṛtijarārāgādirogāḥ kṣaṇācchāntiṃ yānti jagatpradhānabhiṣaje tasmai parasmai namaḥ // VRrs_1.1 //
indrado gomukhaścaiva kambalir vyāḍireva ca // VRrs_1.3 //
khaṇḍaḥ kāpāliko brahmā govindo lampako hariḥ // VRrs_1.4 //
śuddhiḥ sattvaṃ drutirbhasmakaraṇaṃ ca pravakṣyate // VRrs_1.10 //
avatīrṇa iva kṣoṇīṃ śaradambumucāṃ gaṇaḥ // VRrs_1.12 //
bhittvā bhuvamivottīrṇo yo vibhāti bhṛśonnataḥ // VRrs_1.13 //
yo guhādhigato lokairgirīśa iti gīyate // VRrs_1.16 //
bhakṣaṇaṃ sparśanaṃ dānaṃ dhyānaṃ ca paripūjanam /
sa mukto duṣkṛtādghorātprayāti paramaṃ padam // VRrs_1.33 //
mūrchitvā harati rujaṃ bandhanamanubhūya muktido bhavati /
amarīkaroti hi mṛtaḥ ko +anyaḥ karuṇākaraḥ sūtāt // VRrs_1.34 //
śvitraṃ tadapi ca śamayati yastasmātkaḥ pavitrataraḥ sūtāt // VRrs_1.35 //
rasabandha eva dhanyaḥ prārambhe yasya satatamitikaraṇā /
setsyati rase kariṣye mahīmahaṃ nirjarāmaraṇām // VRrs_1.36 //
sukṛtaphalaṃ tāvadidaṃ sukule yajjanma dhīśca tatrāpi /
sāpi ca sakalamahītalatulanaphalā bhūtalaṃ ca suvidheyam // VRrs_1.37 //
bhogāśca santi śarīre tadanityamato vṛthā sakalam // VRrs_1.38 //
muktau sā ca jñānāt taccābhyāsāt sa ca sthire dehe // VRrs_1.39 //
tatsthairye na samarthaṃ rasāyanaṃ kimapi mūlalohādi /
svayamasthirasvabhāvaṃ dāhyaṃ kledyaṃ ca śoṣyaṃ ca // VRrs_1.40 //
kāṣṭhauṣadhyo nāge nāgo vaṅge +atha vaṅgamapi śulbe /
śulbaṃ tāre tāraṃ kanake kanakaṃ ca līyate sūte // VRrs_1.41 //
amṛtatvaṃ hi bhajante haramūrtau yogino yathā līnāḥ /
paramātmanīva satataṃ bhavati layo yatra sarvasattvānām /
yadyogagamyamamalaṃ manaso +api na gocaraṃ tattvam // VRrs_1.47 //
pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇena yo na jānāti sūtakam /
adṛṣṭavigrahaṃ devaṃ kathaṃ jñāsyati cinmayam // VRrs_1.55 //
asminn eva śarīre yeṣāṃ paramātmano na saṃvedaḥ /
iti pañcavidho jātaḥ kṣetrabhedena śambhujaḥ // VRrs_1.68 //
devairnāgaiś ca tau kūpau pūritau mṛdbhir aśmabhiḥ /
tadāprabhṛti lokānāṃ tau jātāv atidurlabhau // VRrs_1.71 //
daśāṣṭasaṃskṛtaiḥ siddho dehaṃ lohaṃ karoti saḥ // VRrs_1.72 //
pārado vividhairyogaiḥ sarvarogaharaḥ sa hi // VRrs_1.73 //
etāṃ rasasamutpattiṃ yo jānāti sa dhārmikaḥ /
āyur ārogyasaṃtānaṃ rasasiddhiṃ ca vindati // VRrs_1.76 //
jarāruṅmṛtyunāśāya rasyate vā raso mataḥ // VRrs_1.77 //
dehalohamayīṃ siddhiṃ sūte sūtastataḥ smṛtaḥ // VRrs_1.78 //
jalago jalarūpeṇa tvarito haṃsago bhavet // VRrs_1.82 //
sa tāṃś ca jīvayejjīvāṃstena jīvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ /

jalarūpeṇa dravatvena jalagaḥ jalena saha gamanaśīlaḥ bhavet rasasya
cūrṇaprāyo +atisūkṣmāṃśa iti bhāvaḥ tvaritaḥ cañcalaḥ cāñcalyādityarthaḥ
haṃsagaḥ haṃsavad gamanaśīlaḥ bhavet malarūpeṇa malavattvāt malagaḥ malena
saha miśritaḥ doṣasaṃśliṣṭaḥ bhavet sadhūmaḥ vahnidṛṣṭatvāt dhūmagaḥ dhūmena
saha gamanaśīlaḥ uḍḍayanasvabhāvaḥ bhavet anyā aparā pañcamītyarthaḥ daivī
adṛśyarūpā jīvasya rasasya gatiḥ gamanam astīti śeṣaḥ tayā gatyā aṇḍāt
deharūpakośāt jīvaḥ ātmā iva niṣkramet rasa iti bhāvaḥ kena pathā dehāt jīvo
nirgacchati tat yathā na dṛśyate tathā pāradasya pañcamī gatirapi na jñātum
śakyate ityarthaḥ // VRrsBo_1.84ab;2

pūrvaśloke jīvagatiśabdena rasagatiriti pradarśitaṃ jīvaśabdasya rasārthatve
hetumāha sa iti // VRrsBo_1.84ab;3

saḥ rasaḥ tān jīvān jīvayet jarāmaraṇādivināśanadvārā dīrghajīvanaṃ
pradāpayet tena hetunā rasaḥ jīvaḥ jīvayatīti vyutpattyā jīvanadāyakaḥ
smṛtaḥ kathitaḥ // VRrsBo_1.84ab;4
catasro gatayo dṛśyā adṛśyā pañcamī gatiḥ // VRrs_1.84 //
mantradhyānādinā tasya rudhyate pañcamī gatiḥ // VRrs_1.85 //

saṃprati pañcabhūtātmakasya tasya gatibhedena nāmabhedamāha jalaga iti //
VRrsṬī_1.85;1

yaḥ pārado jalarūpeṇa jalasvabhāvena gacchati sa jalago jalagativiśiṣṭa
ityucyate // VRrsṬī_1.85;2
bhūmimalakiṭṭayogenaiva teṣāṃ ghanatvaṃ sthiratvaṃ ca // VRrsṬī_1.85;5
ata eva drutirūpeṇaiva teṣāṃ sthitiḥ sambhavati // VRrsṬī_1.85;6

yaḥ pāradastvaritastvarayā vegena yukto nātyucchritam ākāśe gacchati kiṃtu
bhūmisaṃnihitākāśe bhuvi ca sa haṃsaga ityucyate // VRrsṬī_1.85;9

yastu malarūpeṇa kṛṣṇavarṇenāṃśena viśiṣṭo gacchati sa malaga ityucyate //
VRrsṬī_1.85;12

yaśca sadhūmo dhūmena dhūmasamānavarṇordhvarekhāsahitākāśagatyā saha vartata
iti sadhūmaḥ sa dhūmaga ityucyate // VRrsṬī_1.85;13
te hi dhūmarodhāt sphoṭaṃ kṛtvodgacchantītyanubhūyate // VRrsṬī_1.85;15

nābhiyantrabhūdharalohamūṣādiyantrādinā nirdhūmajāraṇāyāmapi mahatā
prayatnenāpi teṣāṃ sthiratvaṃ mīmāṃsyaṃ bhavati bhavennanveti //
VRrsṬī_1.85;16

tasyā devagaterivādṛśyatvāttayā yuktaḥ sa pārado+aṇḍājjīva ivādṛśyagatyā
yuktaḥ svasthānānniṣkramennirgacchati // VRrsṬī_1.85;21

aṇḍāddehasya nirgamanaṃ dṛśyate dehasahitasya jīvasya tu bahirnirgamanaṃ na
dṛśyate // VRrsṬī_1.85;22

bālasya cālanaśvāsocchvāsādikriyayā cānumīyate tadvad asyāpīti bhāvaḥ //
VRrsṬī_1.85;23

tayā gatyā yukta evāyaṃ jīvānprāṇino jīvayettena sa raso jīvanāmnā smṛtaḥ //
VRrsṬī_1.85;24

kārayettaṃ saṃskāranipuṇavaidyahastena rājā tatsamo vasumānvātmanaḥ prajānāṃ
ca rakṣaṇārtham iti bhāvaḥ // VRrsṬī_1.85;25
saṃskārastasya bhiṣajā nipuṇena tu rakṣayet // VRrs_1.86 //
vīkṣamāṇāṃ vadhūṃ dṛṣṭvā jighṛkṣuḥ kūpago rasaḥ // VRrs_1.87 //
udgacchati javātsāpi taṃ dṛṣṭvā yāti vegataḥ /
anugacchati tāṃ sūtaḥ sīmānaṃ yojanonmitam // VRrs_1.88 //
tāṃ mṛdaṃ pātanayantre kṣiptvā sūtaṃ haranti ca // VRrs_1.90 //
capalo rasakaśceti jñātvāṣṭau saṃgrahed rasān // VRrs_2.1 //
devyā rajo bhavedgandho dhātuḥ śukraṃ tathābhrakam iti kṣepakaḥ /

gaurītejaḥ paramamamṛtaṃ vātapittakṣayaghnam prajñābodhi praśamitarujaṃ
vṛṣyamāyuṣyamagryam /

balyaṃ snigdhaṃ rucidam akaphaṃ dīpanaṃ śītavīryaṃ tattadyogaiḥ sakalagadahṛd
vyoma sūtendrabandhi // VRrs_2.2 //

tadevābhrakaṃ bhūmimadhye rājahastāt sapādahastād adhastād adhobhāgasthaṃ yat
khanijaṃ ghanam abhrakaṃ vajrākhyaṃ tad eva pūrvoktaguṇam //
VRrsṬī_2.3;1
prāyasteṣāṃ hi bhūmigarbhasthānām eva pūrṇātmaguṇatvāt // VRrsṬī_2.3;4
tatsevitaṃ malaṃ baddhvā mārayatyeva mānavam // VRrs_2.5 //
tadbhuktaṃ kurute kuṣṭhaṃ maṇḍalākhyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // VRrs_2.6 //
śvetaṃ raktaṃ ca pītaṃ ca kṛṣṇamevaṃ caturvidham /
sacandrikaṃ ca kiṭṭābhaṃ vyoma na grāsayedrasaḥ /
grasitaśca niyojyo +asau lohe caiva rasāyane // VRrs_2.12 //

grāsābhāve hyupoṣita iva rasaḥ kāryakaro na bhavedityāha sacandrikamiti //
VRrsṬī_2.12;1

grasitaśca grasitābhrasattva eva lohe svarṇādyutpādane lohamāraṇe
rogavāraṇārthaṃ lohaprayoge ca niyojyaḥ // VRrsṬī_2.12;4

tathā rasāyane jvarāṅkuśādi tattadrase rasāyane ca
lakṣmīvilāsavajrapañjarādirūpe vakṣyamāṇa ityarthaḥ // VRrsṬī_2.12;5

rasa īyate prāpyate+aneneti vyutpattyātra rasaśabdena rasarasāyanayoḥ
saṃgrahāt // VRrsṬī_2.12;6
niścandrikaṃ mṛtaṃ vyoma sevyaṃ sarvagadeṣu ca /
sevitaṃ candrasaṃyuktaṃ mehaṃ mandānalaṃ caret // VRrs_2.13 //
tair dṛṣṭaṃ kālakūṭākhyaṃ viṣaṃ jīvanahetave // VRrs_2.14 //
anyathā tv aguṇaṃ kṛtvā vikarotyeva niścitam // VRrs_2.15 //
nirdoṣaṃ jāyate nūnaṃ prakṣiptaṃ vāpi gojale // VRrs_2.16 //
tato dhānyābhrakaṃ kṛtvā piṣṭvā matsyākṣikārasaiḥ // VRrs_2.17 //
cakrīṃ kṛtvā viśoṣyātha puṭed ardhebhake puṭe /

tatastadabhrakaṃ dhānyābhrakaṃ kṛtvā matsyākṣikārasenaikadinaparyantaṃ
saṃmardya cakrīṃ vartulasthūlavaṭikāṃ vidhāyāvaśoṣya śarāvasaṃpuṭitaṃ
kṛtvārdhe+abhrake puṭe puṭed ardhe+abhrake puṭam ardhagajapuṭaṃ tacca
gajapuṭagatārdhabhāgaṃ vanopalaiḥ pūrayitvā bhavati // VRrsṬī_2.18ab;1

pratipuṭam abhrakasya mardanaṃ tataścakrīṃ kṛtvā viśoṣya śarāvasaṃpuṭitaṃ
kāryam // VRrsṬī_2.18ab;3
puṭedevaṃ hi ṣaḍvāraṃ paunarnavarasaiḥ saha // VRrs_2.18 //
ardhebhākhyapuṭais tadvat saptavāraṃ puṭet khalu // VRrs_2.19 //
evaṃ siddhaṃ ghanaṃ sarvayogeṣu viniyojayet // VRrs_2.20 //

cūrṇābhra abhracūrṇaṃ śālisaṃyuktam adyāpyatra śāliparimāṇaṃ noktaṃ tathāpi
tantrāntarānusaraṇāt pādamitaśālidhānyasahitaṃ boddhavyaṃ tathā ca
rasendrasārasaṃgrahe /

abhraṃ cūrṇitaṃ kṛtvā pādāṃśaśālidhānyena saha sthūlavastre baddhvā kāñjike
tāvanmardanīyaṃ yāvad vastracchidrāt ślakṣṇaṃ vālukārahitaṃ sat niryāti
taddhānyābhraṃ smṛtam // VRrsBo_2.21;4
rundhyātkoṣṭhyāṃ dṛḍhaṃ dhmātaṃ sattvarūpaṃ bhaved ghanam // VRrs_2.26 //
matsyākṣyāḥ kāṇḍavallyāśca haṃsapādyā rasaiḥ pṛthak // VRrs_2.27 //
payo dadhi ghṛtaṃ mūtraṃ saviṭkaṃ cājam ucyate /
adhaḥpātanakoṣṭhyāṃ hi dhmātvā sattvaṃ nipātayet // VRrs_2.31 //

abhra:: sattvapātana:: separation of sattva and
kiṭṭa
koṣṭhyāṃ kiṭṭaṃ samāhṛtya vicūrṇya ravakān haret /

koṣṭhyām avaśiṣṭasattvaṃ kācakiṭṭasaṃśliṣṭaṃ kaṇarūpaṃ durgrāhyaṃ tattu agnau
śānte sati samāhṛtyaikīkṛtya bahir niṣkāsya saṃkuṭya vicūrṇya tatsaṃśliṣṭaṃ
kaṇasattvaṃ haret // VRrsṬī_2.32ab;1
tatkiṭṭaṃ svalpaṭaṅkena gomayena vimardya ca // VRrs_2.32 //
bhūyaḥ kiṭṭaṃ samāhṛtya mṛditvā sattvamāharet // VRrs_2.33 //
iti śuddhaṃ bhavetsattvaṃ yojyaṃ rasarasāyane // VRrs_2.35 //
mṛdu syāddaśavāreṇa sattvaṃ lohādikaṃ kharam // VRrs_2.36 //
tṛṇaṃ kṣiptvā dahedyāvattāvadvā bharjanaṃ caret // VRrs_2.38 //
adhordhvaṃ vaṭapatrāṇi niścandraṃ tripuṭaiḥ khagam // VRrs_2.43 //
goghṛtena ca taccūrṇaṃ bharjayet pūrvavat tridhā /
yatheṣṭaṃ viniyoktavyaṃ jāraṇe ca rasāyane // VRrs_2.49 //
drutayo naiva nirdiṣṭāḥ śāstre dṛṣṭā api dṛḍham /
vinā śaṃbhoḥ prasādena na sidhyanti kadācana // VRrs_2.50 //

vallaḥ dviguñjā guñjātrayam iti līlāvatī sārdhaguñjeti rājanighaṇṭuḥ //
VRrsBo_2.50;1

vellavyoṣasamanvitaṃ ghṛtayutaṃ vallonmitaṃ sevitaṃ divyābhraṃ
kṣayapāṇḍuruggrahaṇikāśūlāmakuṣṭhāmayam /

jūrtiṃ śvāsagadaṃ pramehamaruciṃ kāsāmayaṃ durdharaṃ mandāgniṃ jaṭharavyathāṃ
vijayate yogairaśeṣāmayān // VRrs_2.51 //
śyāmalaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇaśca karburaścāṣṭadhā hi saḥ // VRrs_2.53 //
dīptāgnikṛt pavisamānaguṇastarasvī vaikrāntakaḥ khalu vapurbalalohakārī // VRrs_2.54 //
durgā bhagavatī devī taṃ śūlena vyamardayat // VRrs_2.56 //
tasya raktaṃ tu patitaṃ yatra yatra sthitaṃ bhuvi /
tatra tatra tu vaikrāntaṃ vajrākāraṃ mahārasam // VRrs_2.57 //
vindhyasya dakṣiṇe vāsti hy uttare vāsti sarvataḥ /
vikṛntayati lohāni tena vaikrāntakaḥ smṛtaḥ // VRrs_2.58 //
dehasiddhikaraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ pīte pītaṃ site sitam /
śeṣe dve niṣphale varjye vaikrāntamiti saptadhā // VRrs_2.60 //
yatra kṣetre sthitaṃ caiva vaikrāntaṃ tatra bhairavam /
vaikrāntakāḥ syustridinaṃ viśuddhāḥ saṃsveditāḥ kṣārapaṭūni dattvā /
paunaḥpunyena vā kuryāddravaṃ dattvā puṭaṃ tvanu /
bhasmībhūtaṃ tu vaikrāntaṃ vajrasthāne niyojayet // VRrs_2.65 //
tatraiva patate sattvaṃ vaikrāntasya na saṃśayaḥ // VRrs_2.68 //
bhasmatvaṃ samupāgato vikṛtako hemnā mṛtenānvitaḥ pādāṃśena kaṇājyavellasahito guñjāmitaḥ sevitaḥ /
yakṣmāṇaṃ jaraṇaṃ ca pāṇḍugudajaṃ śvāsaṃ ca kāsāmayaṃ duṣṭāṃ ca grahaṇīm uraḥkṣatamukhān rogāñjayed dehakṛt // VRrs_2.70 //
triḥsaptadivasair nṝṇāṃ gaṅgāmbha iva pātakam // VRrs_2.72 //
tāpyaḥ sūryāṃśusaṃtapto mādhave māsi dṛśyate // VRrs_2.73 //
mākṣīkadhātuḥ sakalāmayaghnaḥ prāṇo rasendrasya paraṃ hi vṛṣyaḥ /
taptaṃ kṣiptaṃ varākvāthe śuddhimāyāti mākṣikam // VRrs_2.78 //
pañcakroḍapuṭair dagdhaṃ mriyate mākṣikaṃ khalu // VRrs_2.79 //
evaṃ mṛtaṃ rase yojyaṃ rasāyanavidhāv api // VRrs_2.80 //
dhmātaṃ prakaṭamūṣāyāṃ sattvaṃ muñcati mākṣikam // VRrs_2.81 //
mūṣāyāṃ muñcati dhmātaṃ sattvaṃ śulbanibhaṃ mṛdu // VRrs_2.83 //
mākṣīkasattvena rasendrapiṣṭaṃ kṛtvā vilīne ca baliṃ nidhāya /

saṃmiśrya saṃmardya ca khalvamadhye nikṣipya sattvaṃ drutimabhrakasya //
VRrs_2.85 //
vidhāya golaṃ lavaṇākhyayantre paceddinārdhaṃ mṛduvahninā ca /

svataḥ suśītaṃ paricūrṇya samyagvallonmitaṃ vyoṣaviḍaṅgayuktam // VRrs_2.86
//
saṃsevitaṃ kṣaudrayutaṃ nihanti jarāṃ sarogāṃ tvapamṛtyumeva /
marditaṃ tasya vāpena sattvaṃ mākṣīkajaṃ dravet // VRrs_2.88 //
tṛtīyo bheṣaje teṣu pūrvapūrvo guṇottaraḥ // VRrs_2.91 //
āyāti śuddhiṃ vimalo dhātavaśca yathā pare // VRrs_2.92 //
piṣṭo mūṣodare liptaḥ saṃśoṣya ca nirudhya ca // VRrs_2.94 //
sattvaṃ muñcati tadyukto rasaḥ syātsa rasāyanaḥ // VRrs_2.95 //
sattvaṃ candrārkasaṃkāśaṃ patate nātra saṃśayaḥ // VRrs_2.97 //

līḍho vyoṣavarānvito vimalako yukto ghṛtaiḥ sevito
hanyāddurbhagakṛjjvarāñśvayathukaṃ pāṇḍupramehārucīḥ /

mūlārtiṃ grahaṇīṃ ca śūlamatulaṃ yakṣmāmayaṃ kāmalāṃ
sarvānpittamarudgadānkimaparairyogairaśeṣāmayān // VRrs_2.101 //

tatrādau svarṇādibhya utpattibhedena trividhasya gomūtragandhinaḥ tasya
lakṣaṇādikamāha svarṇeti // VRrsBo_2.104;1

tantrāntare tu utpattibhedena bhinnasya tasya cāturvidhyamuktaṃ yathā carake
/
atra tu āyasaṃ noktaṃ tallakṣaṇamapi tatraiva draṣṭavyaṃ yathā /
vipāke kaṭu śītaṃ ca sarvaśreṣṭhaṃ tadāyasaṃ // VRrsBo_2.104;4

atra haimaśilājatuno paramarasāyanatvenoktatvād āyasasyāpi mukhyataḥ
rasāyanaguṇatvena ekakāryakatvād āyasaṃ pṛthaṅnoktamiti mantavyam //
VRrsBo_2.104;7
salile +atha vilīnaṃ ca tacchuddhaṃ hi śilājatu // VRrs_2.107 //

nūnaṃ sajvarapāṇḍuśophaśamanaṃ mehāgnimāndyāpahaṃ medaśchedakaraṃ ca
yakṣmaśamanaṃ śūlāmayonmūlanam /

gulmaplīhavināśanaṃ jaṭharahṛcchūlaghnamāmāpahaṃ sarvatvaggadanāśanaṃ
kimaparaṃ dehe ca lohe hitam // VRrs_2.108 //

sources

bhasmībhūtaśilodbhavaṃ samatulaṃ kāntaṃ ca vaikrāntakaṃ yuktaṃ ca
triphalākaṭutrikaghṛtairvallena tulyaṃ bhajet /

pāṇḍau yakṣmagade tathāgnisadane meheṣu mūlāmaye gulmaplīhamahodare bahuvidhe
śūle ca yonyāmaye // VRrs_2.114 //
kṣiptvā mūṣodare ruddhvā gāḍhairdhmātaṃ hi kokilaiḥ /
naitasya māraṇaṃ sattvapātanaṃ vihitaṃ budhaiḥ // VRrs_2.118 //
tadvāntaṃ hi ghanībhūtaṃ saṃjātaṃ sasyakaṃ khalu // VRrs_2.119 //

rasāyanaṃ vamanarekakaraṃ garaghnaṃ śvitrāpahaṃ gaditamatra mayūratuttham //
VRrs_2.122 //
nirudhya mūṣikāmadhye mriyate kaukkuṭaiḥ puṭaiḥ // VRrs_2.125 //
indragopākṛti caiva sattvaṃ bhavati śobhanam // VRrs_2.127 //
tāmrarūpaṃ paridhmātaṃ sattvaṃ muñcati sasyakam // VRrs_2.128 //
tanmudrikā kṛtasparśā śūlaghnī tatkṣaṇād bhavet // VRrs_2.130 //
tatra śūlaṃ samutpannaṃ tatraiva vilayaṃ gatam // VRrs_2.132 //
lepitaṃ hanti vegena śūlaṃ yatra kvacidbhavet /
sadyaḥ sūtikaraṃ nāryāḥ sadyo netrarujāpaham // VRrs_2.134 //
śeṣau tu madhyau lākṣāvacchīghradrāvau tu niṣphalau /

athoddeśakramānurodhena tutthavarṇanāntaraṃ capalaṃ varṇayati gaura iti //
VRrsṬī_2.136ab;1

ayaṃ padārtho vyāvahārikanāmnāsmin deśe loke na prasiddhaḥ //
VRrsṬī_2.136ab;2

āṅglabhāṣāyāṃ reḍiyam iti nāmnopalabdhaḥ padārtho +ayam eveti kecit //
VRrsṬī_2.136ab;4
śailaṃ tu cūrṇayitvā tu dhānyāmlopaviṣair viṣaiḥ /
piṇḍaṃ baddhvā tu vidhivatpātayeccapalaṃ tathā // VRrs_2.141 //
sadalo durduraḥ prokto nirdalaḥ kāravellakaḥ // VRrs_2.142 //
rasakasya dvaividhyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cāha rasaka iti // VRrsBo_2.142;1
kharparītutthakaṃ tutthād anyat tad rasakaṃ smṛtam /
ye guṇāstutthake proktāste guṇāḥ rasake smṛtāḥ // VRrsBo_2.142;2
sadalaḥ sapattraḥ vaṃśapattraharitālavad iti bhāvaḥ // VRrsBo_2.142;4
athoddeśakramaprāptaṃ rasakaṃ varṇayati rasaka iti // VRrsṬī_2.142;1
śreṣṭhau siddharasau khyātau dehalohakarau param // VRrs_2.144 //
dehalohamayī siddhirdāsī tasya na saṃśayaḥ // VRrs_2.145 //
śuddhaṃ doṣavinirmuktaṃ pītavarṇaṃ tu jāyate // VRrs_2.146 //
nṛmūtre vāśvamūtre vā takre vā kāñjike +athavā /
śuddhatāmraṃ rasaṃ tāraṃ śuddhasvarṇaprabhaṃ yathā // VRrs_2.149 //
sāruṣkaraiśca pādāṃśaiḥ sāmlaiḥ saṃmardya kharparam // VRrs_2.150 //
kharpare prahṛte jvālā bhavennīlā sitā yadi /
tadā saṃdaṃśato mūṣāṃ dhṛtvā kṛtvā tvadhomukhīm // VRrs_2.152 //
evaṃ tricaturairvāraiḥ sarvaṃ sattvaṃ viniḥsaret // VRrs_2.153 //
mūkamūṣāgataṃ dhmātaṃ śuddhaṃ sattvaṃ vimuñcati // VRrs_2.154 //
samyaksaṃcūrṇya tatpakvaṃ godugdhena ghṛtena ca // VRrs_2.155 //
sattvaṃ vaṅgākṛtiṃ grāhyaṃ rasakasya manoharam // VRrs_2.156 //
sacchidraṃ tanmukhe mallaṃ tanmukhe +adhomukhīṃ kṣipet // VRrs_2.157 //
pittaṃ kṣayaṃ ca pāṇḍuṃ ca śvayathuṃ gulmameva ca /
raktagulmaṃ ca nārīṇāṃ pradaraṃ somarogakam // VRrs_2.162 //
rajaḥśūlaṃ ca nārīṇāṃ kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ ca hidhmikām // VRrs_2.163 //
gandhakasya tu māhātmyaṃ tadguhyaṃ vada me prabho // VRrs_3.2 //
tatra tyaktvā tu tadvastraṃ susnātā kṣīrasāgare // VRrs_3.7 //
evaṃ te śoṇitaṃ bhadre praviṣṭaṃ kṣīrasāgare /
ye guṇāḥ pārade proktāste caivātra bhavantviti // VRrs_3.11 //
iti devagaṇaiḥ prītaiḥ purā proktaṃ sureśvari /
tenāyaṃ gandhako nāma vikhyātaḥ kṣitimaṇḍale // VRrs_3.12 //
sa cāpi trividho devi śukacañcunibho varaḥ /
caturdhā gandhako jñeyo varṇaiḥ śvetādibhiḥ khalu /
khaṭhikā khaḍu cās iti nāmnā loke prasiddhā // VRrsṬī_3.14;1
śukapicchaḥ sa eva syācchreṣṭho rasarasāyane // VRrs_3.15 //

gandhāśmātirasāyanaḥ sumadhuraḥ pāke kaṭūṣṇo mataḥ
kaṇḍūkuṣṭhavisarpadadrudalano dīptānalaḥ pācanaḥ /

āmonmocanaśoṣaṇo viṣaharaḥ sūtendravīryaprado gaurīpuṣpabhavastathā kṛmiharaḥ
satyātmakaḥ sūtajit // VRrs_3.17 //
vasā gandhakagandhāḍhyā sarvato niḥsṛtā tanoḥ // VRrs_3.19 //
evaṃ saṃśodhitaḥ so +ayaṃ pāṣāṇān ambare tyajet /
ghṛte viṣaṃ tuṣākāraṃ svayaṃ piṇḍatvameva ca // VRrs_3.22 //
iti śuddho hi gandhāśmā nāpathyairvikṛtiṃ vrajet /
tadrasaiḥ saptadhā bhinno gandhakaḥ pariśudhyati // VRrs_3.24 //
sthālyāṃ dugdhaṃ vinikṣipya mukhe vastraṃ nibadhya ca /
gandhakaṃ tatra nikṣipya cūrṇitaṃ sikatākṛti // VRrs_3.25 //
śatavāraṃ kṛtaṃ caiva nirgandho jāyate dhruvam // VRrs_3.27 //
aratnimātre vastre tad viprakīrya viveṣṭya tat // VRrs_3.29 //
druto nipatito gandho binduśaḥ kācabhājane // VRrs_3.30 //
tāṃ drutiṃ prakṣipet pattre nāgavallyās tribindukām /
vallena pramitaṃ svacchaṃ sūtendraṃ ca vimardayet // VRrs_3.31 //
aṅgulyātha sapattrāṃ tāṃ drutiṃ sūtaṃ ca bhakṣayet /
karoti dīpanaṃ tīvraṃ kṣayaṃ pāṇḍuṃ ca nāśayet // VRrs_3.32 //
āmaṃ vināśayatyāśu laghutvaṃ prakaroti ca // VRrs_3.33 //
hanti kṣayamukhān rogān kuṣṭharogaṃ viśeṣataḥ // VRrs_3.34 //
vilipya sakalaṃ dehaṃ tiṣṭhedgharme tataḥ param /
takrabhaktaṃ ca bhuñjīta tṛtīye prahare khalu // VRrs_3.39 //
bhajedrātrau tathā vahniṃ samutthāya tathā prage /
durjayā bahukālīnā pāmā kaṇḍuḥ suniścitam // VRrs_3.41 //
gandhakaṃ navanītena piṣṭvā vastraṃ lipedghanam // VRrs_3.43 //
tadvartiṃ jvalitāṃ daṃśe dhṛtāṃ kuryād adhomukhīm /
tailaṃ patedadhobhāṇḍe grāhyaṃ yogeṣu yojayet // VRrs_3.44 //
agnikārī mahānuṣṇo vīryavṛddhiṃ karoti ca // VRrs_3.45 //
svādu snigdhaṃ himaṃ netryaṃ kaṣāyaṃ raktapittanut /
gairikaṃ tu gavāṃ dugdhairbhāvitaṃ śuddhim ṛcchati // VRrs_3.49 //
gairikaṃ sattvarūpaṃ hi nandinā parikīrtitam // VRrs_3.50 //
sakṛdbhṛṅgāmbunā klinnaṃ kāsīsaṃ nirmalaṃ bhavet // VRrs_3.55 //
kāsīsaṃ śuddhimāpnoti pittaiśca rajasā striyāḥ // VRrs_3.57 //
sevitaṃ hanti vegena śvitraṃ pāṇḍukṣayāmayam // VRrs_3.59 //
palitaṃ valibhiḥ sārdhaṃ vināśayati niścitam // VRrs_3.61 //
phaṭakī phullikā ceti dvitīyā parikīrtitā // VRrs_3.63 //
nirbhārā śubhravarṇā ca snigdhā sāmlāparā matā /
sā phullatuvarī proktā lepāttāmraṃ caredayaḥ // VRrs_3.65 //

sphaṭikīlepācchatavāraṃ tāmrapatraṃ lohapatraṃ prati vā liptā satī tatpaścāt
caret pāradena prayojyakartrā cārayed bhakṣitāṃ kārayed ityarthaḥ //
VRrsṬī_3.65;2

phullatuvarīlepena tāmraṃ lauhāṃśam ujhati tāmre yaḥ lauhāṃśaḥ vidyate sa
nirgacchatītyarthaḥ tāmraṃ lauhavat kāṭhinyaṃ gacchatītyartho vā //
VRrsBo_3.65;2
kāṅkṣī kaṣāyā kaṭukāmlakaṇṭhyā keśyā vraṇaghnī viṣanāśanī ca /
śvitrāpahā netrahitā tridoṣaśāntipradā pāradajāraṇī ca // VRrs_3.66 //
kṣārāmlair marditā dhmātā sattvaṃ muñcati niścitam // VRrs_3.68 //
haritālaṃ dvidhā proktaṃ pattrādyaṃ piṇḍasaṃjñakam // VRrs_3.70 //
svarṇavarṇaṃ guru snigdhaṃ tanupattraṃ ca bhāsuram /
tat pattratālakaṃ proktaṃ bahupattraṃ rasāyanam // VRrs_3.71 //
snigdhamuṣṇakaṭukaṃ ca dīpanaṃ kuṣṭhahāri haritālamucyate // VRrs_3.73 //
snigdhaṃ kūṣmāṇḍatoye vā tilakṣārajale api vā /
toye vā cūrṇasaṃyukte dolāyantreṇa śudhyati // VRrs_3.74 //
tālakaṃ kaṇaśaḥ kṛtvā daśāṃśena ca ṭaṅkaṇam /
vastre caturguṇe baddhvā dolāyantre dinaṃ pacet /
trivāraṃ tālakaṃ bhāvyaṃ piṣṭvā mūtre +atha māhiṣe // VRrs_3.78 //
evaṃ dvādaśadhā pācyaṃ śuddhaṃ yogeṣu yojayet // VRrs_3.79 //
sthālyāṃ kṣiptvā vidadhyācca tv amlena chidrayoginā // VRrs_3.80 //
yāmānte chidramudghāṭya dṛṣṭe dhūme ca pāṇḍure /
śītāṃ sthālīṃ samuttārya sattvamutkṛṣya cāharet // VRrs_3.82 //
granthavistārabhītyāto likhitā na mayā khalu // VRrs_3.83 //
kṣiptvā ṣoḍaśikātaile miśrayitvā tataḥ pacet // VRrs_3.84 //
svāṅgaśītamadhasthaṃ ca sattvaṃ śvetaṃ samāharet // VRrs_3.85 //
tridhā tāṃ ca mṛdā liptvā pariśoṣya kharātape // VRrs_3.87 //
kūpikaṇṭhasthitaṃ śītaṃ śuddhaṃ sattvaṃ samāharet // VRrs_3.88 //
palārdhapramitaṃ tālaṃ baddhvā vastre site dṛḍhe /
balinālipya yatnena trivāraṃ pariśoṣya ca // VRrs_3.89 //
khaṇḍākhyā ceti tadrūpaṃ vivicya parikathyate // VRrs_3.91 //
śyāmā raktā sagaurā ca bhārāḍhyā śyāmikā matā /
tejasvinī ca nirgaurā tāmrābhā kaṇavīrakā // VRrs_3.92 //
aśmarīṃ mūtrakṛcchraṃ ca aśuddhā kurute śilā /
mandāgniṃ malabandhaṃ ca śuddhā sarvarujāpahā // VRrs_3.95 //
koṣṭhyāṃ ruddhvā dṛḍhaṃ dhmātā sattvaṃ muñcenmanaḥśilā // VRrs_3.98 //
nīlāñjanaṃ ca teṣāṃ hi svarūpamiha varṇyate // VRrs_3.101 //
etad rasod iti brijabhāṣāyām uttaradeśe prasiddham // VRrsṬī_3.103;2

etad rītikiṭṭajanyaṃ dāruharidrākaṣāyājadugdhapākajanyaṃ tu rasāñjanam ityapi
vadanti // VRrsṬī_3.103;3
srotoñjanaṃ himaṃ snigdhaṃ kaṣāyaṃ svādu lekhanam /
ghṛṣṭaṃ tu gairikacchāyaṃ srotojaṃ lakṣayedbudhaḥ // VRrs_3.109 //
bhāvitaṃ bahuśastacca śīghraṃ badhnāti sūtakam // VRrs_3.110 //
tatraikaṃ nālikākhyaṃ hi tadanyadreṇukaṃ matam // VRrs_3.113 //
śyāmapītaṃ laghu tyaktasattvaṃ neṣṭaṃ hi reṇukam // VRrs_3.114 //

katicidvadanti kiṃ tejivāhānāṃ prabalavegasāmarthyaviśiṣṭāśvānāṃ nālaṃ
sadyojātānāṃ teṣāṃ nābhinālaṃ kaṅkuṣṭhamiti // VRrsṬī_3.116ab;2
atha kramaprāptaṃ kaṅkuṣṭhaṃ varṇayati himavaditi // VRrsṬī_3.116;1
ubhayamapi dvividhaṃ nalikā reṇukaśceti khanijabhedau // VRrsṬī_3.116;4
rase rasāyanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ niḥsattvaṃ bahuvaikṛtam // VRrs_3.117 //
śigruśca vajrakando niraṅkaṇā kākamācī ca // VRrs_3.119 //
śudhyanti rasoparasā dhmātā muñcanti sattvāni // VRrs_3.120 //
sattvākarṣo +asya na prokto yasmātsattvamayaṃ hi tat // VRrs_3.122 //
kaṅkuṣṭhaṃ viṣanāśāya bhūyo bhūyaḥ pibennaraḥ // VRrs_3.125 //
gaurīpāṣāṇaḥ śuklapāṣāṇaḥ phulkhaḍi iti loke // VRrsBo_3.125;1

candrikāḍhyaḥ cākacakyaviśiṣṭaḥ sacandrābhravad ujjvalakaṇābahulaḥ ityarthaḥ
// VRrsBo_3.127;1
saurāṣṭradeśe cotpannaḥ sa hi kampillakaḥ smṛtaḥ // VRrs_3.128 //
sphaṭikābhaśca śaṅkhābho haridrābhas trayaḥ smṛtāḥ // VRrs_3.130 //

gaurīpāṣāṇasya paryāyān varṇabhedena traividhyaṃ cāha gaurīti //
VRrsBo_3.130;1
pītavikaṭahatacūrṇakāḥ iti ime trayaḥ paryāyāḥ // VRrsBo_3.130;2

pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ haridrābhagaurīpāṣāṇāt śaṅkhābhaḥ śaṅkhābhapāṣāṇāt sphaṭikābhaḥ
śreṣṭhaḥ // VRrsBo_3.130;4

trividhasya tasya svarūpamāha yaḥ kiṃcit pītavarṇo vikaṭakarāla āhataḥ
saṃcūrṇarūpo bhavati sa gaurīpāṣāṇa ityucyate // VRrsṬī_3.130;1

tṛtīyabhedāpanno yaḥ sa tu haridrābho haridrāsamānaḥ pūrṇapītavarṇaḥ //
VRrsṬī_3.130;5
pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ guṇaiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kāravallīphale kṣipet /
taduktaṃ navasārākhyaṃ cūlikālavaṇaṃ ca tat // VRrs_3.135 //
viḍākhyaṃ ca tridoṣaghnaṃ cūlikālavaṇam matam // VRrs_3.136 //
varāṭikā:: medic. properties of bad specimens
tadanye tu varāṭāḥ syur guravaḥ śleṣmapittalāḥ // VRrs_3.140 //
saṃśuṣko bhānutāpena so +agnijāra iti smṛtaḥ // VRrs_3.142 //

himālayādibṛhatparvatāntarvartikṣudrapāṣāṇadvayamadhyanisṛtaḥ
raktavarṇarasaviśeṣaḥ śuṣkībhūtaḥ girisindūra iti khyātaḥ //
VRrsBo_3.145;2

kecittu kāmiyāṃ sindūra iti nāmnā prasiddho+ayaṃ padārtho+atiraktavarṇa iti
vadanti // VRrsṬī_3.145;4
sa eva cātra grāhya iti rāvaṇamatam // VRrsṬī_3.145;6
śvetarekhaḥ pravālābho haṃsapākaḥ sa īritaḥ // VRrs_3.149 //
athoddeśakramaprāptaṃ hiṅgulaṃ varṇayati hiṅgula iti // VRrsṬī_3.149;1
tāṃ mṛdaṃ pātanāyantre pātayanti rasaṃ tataḥ /
tasya cottamasya lakṣaṇamāha śvetareṣa iti // VRrsṬī_3.149;6
sa ca haṃsapāka iti nāmnā kathitaḥ pākena vyavasthitaḥ // VRrsṬī_3.149;7
sa tu carmāra iti nigadyate // VRrsṬī_3.149;11
śoṣito bhāvayitvā ca nirdoṣo jāyate khalu // VRrs_3.152 //
kimatra citraṃ daradaḥ subhāvitaḥ kṣīreṇa meṣyā bahuśo +amlavargaiḥ /

evaṃ suvarṇaṃ bahugharmatāpitaṃ karoti sākṣādvarakuṅkumaprabham // VRrs_3.153
//
arbudasya gireḥ pārśve jātaṃ mṛddāraśṛṅgakam // VRrs_3.155 //
mṛddāraśṛṅgasya lakṣaṇam utpattisthānaṃ cāha sadalamiti // VRrsBo_3.155;1

mṛddāraśṛṅgasya paryāyādikaṃ nighaṇṭvādau anyatra vā kutrāpi granthe na
paridṛśyate paraṃ tu asmaddeśe yanmudrāśaṅkha iti nāmnā prasiddhaṃ
paścimadeśe tat murdārśiṅ iti nāmnā tatratyairabhidhīyate ato manye
mṛddāraśṛṅgakaṃ mudrāśaṅkha eva iti // VRrsBo_3.155;3

arbudagireḥ pārśve nāgakhanisthānabhūte ca jātam utpannaṃ yad viśiṣṭaṃ
kṣudrapāṣāṇātmakaṃ dravyaṃ sadalapītavarṇātmakaṃ tanmṛddāraśṛṅganāmnā
prathitaṃ bhavet // VRrsṬī_3.155;2
yāni kāni ca sattvāni tāni śudhyantyaśeṣataḥ /
dhmātāni śuddhivargeṇa milanti ca parasparam // VRrs_3.158 //
dīpanaḥ pācano vṛṣyo rājāvarto rasāyanaḥ // VRrs_3.160 //
dhmāpitaṃ khadirāṅgāraiḥ sattvaṃ muñcati śobhanam // VRrs_3.165 //
kramāt pītaṃ ca raktaṃ ca sattvaṃ patati śobhanam // VRrs_3.166 //
maṇayo +api ca vijñeyāḥ sūtabandhasya kārakāḥ // VRrs_4.1 //
vaikrāntaḥ sūryakāntaśca hīrakaṃ mauktikaṃ maṇiḥ // VRrs_4.2 //
puṣparāgaṃ pukhrāj iti loke prasiddham // VRrsṬī_4.4ab;1

vaiḍūryaṃ tad yadākāśe sajalameghaśabdād aṅkuraviśiṣṭaṃ bhavati //
VRrsṬī_4.4ab;1
etat pirojā iti loke prasiddham // VRrsṬī_4.4ab;3
vaiḍūryaṃ ca tathā nīlamete ca maṇayo matāḥ /
puṣparāgaḥ savajrākhyaḥ pañca ratnavarāḥ smṛtāḥ // VRrs_4.5 //
māṇikyamuktāphalavidrumāṇi tārkṣyaṃ ca puṣpaṃ bhiduraṃ ca nīlam /
gomedakaṃ cātha vidūrakaṃ ca krameṇa ratnāni navagrahāṇām // VRrs_4.6 //
māṇikyaṃ padmarāgākhyaṃ dvitīyaṃ nīlagandhi ca // VRrs_4.9 //
vṛttāyataṃ samaṃ gātraṃ māṇikyaṃ śreṣṭhamucyate // VRrs_4.10 //
cipiṭaṃ laghu vakraṃ ca māṇikyaṃ duṣṭamaṣṭadhā // VRrs_4.12 //
hlādi śvetaṃ laghu snigdhaṃ raśmivannirmalaṃ mahat /
khyātaṃ toyaprabhaṃ vṛttaṃ mauktikaṃ navadhā śubham // VRrs_4.14 //

toyaprabhaṃ jalābhaṃ yatra tiṣṭhati tatra dūrato jalabhramotpādakam ityarthaḥ
yadvā jalavat taralacchāyaṃ lāvaṇyaviśiṣṭam iti yāvat // VRrsBo_4.14;1

muktāphalaṃ laghu himaṃ madhuraṃ ca kāntidṛṣṭyagnipuṣṭikaraṇaṃ viṣahāri bhedi
/

vīryapradaṃ jalanidherjanitā ca śuktirdīptā ca paktirujamāśu haredavaśyam //
VRrs_4.15 //

nirjalaṃ nirjaḍaṃ ḍalayor aikyāt aśiśiramityarthaḥ uṣṇamiti yāvad yadvā
vicchāyaṃ dṛśyate ca lāvaṇye jalaśabdopacāraḥ muktāphalasya taralacchāyā eva
lāvaṇyaśabdabodhikā yaduktaṃ /
ardhaśubhraṃ ca vikaṭaṃ granthilaṃ mauktikaṃ tyajet // VRrs_4.16 //
puṣṭidaṃ vṛṣyamāyuṣyaṃ dāhaghnaṃ mauktikaṃ matam // VRrs_4.17 //
snigdhamavraṇakaṃ sthūlaṃ pravālaṃ saptadhā śubham // VRrs_4.18 //
nirbhāraṃ śulbavarṇaṃ ca pravālaṃ neṣyate +aṣṭadhā // VRrs_4.19 //
masṛṇaṃ bhāsuraṃ tārkṣyaṃ gātraṃ saptaguṇaṃ matam // VRrs_4.21 //
kapilaṃ karkaśaṃ nīlaṃ pāṇḍu kṛṣṇaṃ ca lāghavam /
cipiṭaṃ vikaṭaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ rūkṣaṃ tārkṣyaṃ na śasyate // VRrs_4.22 //
puṣparāgaṃ guru svacchaṃ snigdhaṃ sthūlaṃ samaṃ mṛdu /
niṣprabhaṃ karkaśaṃ rūkṣaṃ pītaṃ śyāmaṃ natonnatam /
kapiśaṃ kapilaṃ pāṇḍu puṣparāgaṃ parityajet // VRrs_4.25 //
vajraṃ ca trividhaṃ proktaṃ naro nārī napuṃsakam /

aṣṭaphalakam aṣṭadhāram astrādīnām agrabhāgavat sūkṣmāgram ityarthaḥ //
VRrsBo_4.27;1
vyatyāsānnaiva phaladaṃ puṃvajreṇa vinā kvacit // VRrs_4.30 //

āyuḥpradaṃ jhaṭiti sadguṇadaṃ ca vṛṣyaṃ doṣatrayapraśamanam sakalāmayaghnam
/
atha sādhāraṇān sarvaratnadoṣān āha grāsastrāsaśceti // VRrsṬī_4.34a-d;1

yatrāntaḥ koṭara ivāntaḥ śuṣiraviśiṣṭajalābhāso bhavati tādṛśatvam //
VRrsṬī_4.34a-d;8
kṣetratoyabhavā doṣā ratneṣu na laganti te // VRrs_4.34 //
ekayāmāvadhi svinnaṃ vajraṃ śudhyati niścitam // VRrs_4.35 //
śilayā liptamūṣāyāṃ vajraṃ kṣiptvā nirudhya ca // VRrs_4.38 //
niścitaṃ mriyate vajraṃ bhasma vāritaraṃ bhavet // VRrs_4.39 //

triṃśadbhāgamitaṃ hi vajrabhasitaṃ svarṇaṃ kalābhāgikaṃ tāraṃ cāṣṭaguṇaṃ
sitāmṛtavaraṃ rudrāṃśakaṃ cābhrakam /

pādāṃśaṃ khalu tāpyakaṃ vasuguṇaṃ vaikrāntakaṃ ṣaḍguṇaṃ bhāgo +apyuktarasai
raso +ayamuditaḥ ṣāḍguṇyasaṃsiddhaye // VRrs_4.47 //
mṛdu madhye lasajjyotiḥ saptadhā nīlamuttamam // VRrs_4.50 //
komalaṃ vihitaṃ rūkṣaṃ nirbhāraṃ raktagandhi ca /
cipiṭābhaṃ sasūkṣmaṃ ca jalanīlaṃ ca saptadhā // VRrs_4.51 //

nirdalaṃ niṣpattram aśubhagomedasya sapaṭalatvād atra śubhagomedasya
nirdalatvāvatāraṇam // VRrsBo_4.54ab;1
nirdalaṃ masṛṇaṃ dīptaṃ gomedaṃ śubhamaṣṭadhā // VRrs_4.54 //
niṣprabhaṃ pītakācābhaṃ gomedaṃ na śubhāvaham // VRrs_4.55 //
dīpanaṃ pācanaṃ rucyaṃ tvacyaṃ buddhiprabodhanam // VRrs_4.56 //
vaidūryaṃ śyāmaśubhrābhaṃ samaṃ svacchaṃ guru sphuṭam /
raktagarbhottarīyaṃ ca vaidūryaṃ naiva śasyate // VRrs_4.58 //
sthūlaṃ kumbhīphalaṃ pakvaṃ tathā jvālāmukhī śubhā /
dravantī ca rudantī ca payasyā citramūlakam // VRrs_4.64 //
bhūrje taṃ golakaṃ kṛtvā sūtreṇāveṣṭya yatnataḥ // VRrs_4.66 //
saptāhāduddhṛtaṃ caiva puṭe dhṛtvā drutirbhavet // VRrs_4.69 //
amlabhāṇḍagataṃ svedyaṃ saptāhād dravatām vrajet // VRrs_4.70 //
jāyate nātra saṃdeho yogasyāsya prabhāvataḥ // VRrs_4.73 //
kurute yogarājo +ayaṃ ratnānāṃ drāvaṇaṃ param // VRrs_4.74 //
tiṣṭhanti cirakālaṃ tu prāpte kārye niyojayet // VRrs_4.75 //

śuddhaṃ lohaṃ kanakarajataṃ bhānulohāśmasāraṃ pūtīlohaṃ dvitayamuditaṃ
nāgavaṃgābhidhānam /

miśraṃ lohaṃ tritayamuditaṃ pittalaṃ kāṃsyavartaṃ dhātur lohe luha iti mataḥ
so+apyanekārthavācī // VRrs_5.1 //

gāṅgeyaṃ cātha rūpyaṃ gadaharamajarākāri mehāpahāri kṣīṇānāṃ puṣṭikāri
sphuṭamatikaraṇaṃ vīryavṛddhiprakāri // VRrs_5.3 //
tanmerurūpatāṃ yātaṃ suvarṇaṃ sahajaṃ hi tat // VRrs_5.5 //
tatra tatra girīṇāṃ hi jātaṃ khaniṣu yadbhavet /

te ca varṇā granthāntare viśiṣṭadravyasāmyam udāhṛtya pṛthakpradarśitāḥ //
VRrsṬī_5.8;2
dhūsaro bakule puṣpe kṛṣṇaḥ syād atasīsume /
haricchirīṣaje pattre rakto raktotpale smṛtaḥ // VRrsṬī_5.8;5
pāṭalo+atho markaṭe tu kapiśaḥ kṛṣṇalohite // VRrsṬī_5.8;6
rasāyanaṃ mahāśreṣṭhaṃ pavitraṃ vedhajaṃ hi tat // VRrs_5.9 //
prasiddhasvarṇaṃ khanisaṃbhavam āha tatra tatreti // VRrsṬī_5.9;1

ete ca girayo himālayavindhyasahyakarṇāṭakasthanīlagiriprabhṛtayaḥ
svarṇakhanisthānatvena prasiddhāḥ santi // VRrsṬī_5.9;3

kāṣṭhāṃ prāptau pītaraktavarṇau paripūrṇau vihāya caturdaśavarṇapūrṇaṃ
khanijaṃ bhavati // VRrsṬī_5.9;4

ratnaparīkṣakaisteṣāmeva varṇānām utkarṣavibhājakā yāvacchataṃ vikalpitāḥ
kakṣā loke prasiddhāḥ // VRrsṬī_5.9;5

snigdhaṃ medhyaṃ viṣagadaharaṃ bṛṃhaṇaṃ vṛṣyamagryaṃ
yakṣmonmādapraśamanaparaṃ deharogapramāthi /

medhābuddhismṛtisukhakaraṃ sarvadoṣāmayaghnaṃ rucyaṃ dīpi praśamitarujaṃ
svādupākaṃ suvarṇam // VRrs_5.10 //
saukhyaṃ vīryaṃ balaṃ hanti rogavargaṃ karoti ca /
aśuddhamamṛtaṃ svarṇaṃ tasmācchuddhaṃ ca mārayet // VRrs_5.11 //

aṅgārasaṃsthaṃ praharārdhamānaṃ dhmānena tatsyānnanu pūrṇavarṇam // VRrs_5.12
//
jāyate kuṃkumacchāyaṃ svarṇaṃ dvādaśabhiḥ puṭaiḥ // VRrs_5.15 //
hemnaḥ pādaṃ mṛtaṃ sūtaṃ piṣṭamamlena kenacit /
patre liptvā puṭaiḥ pacyādaṣṭabhirmriyate dhruvam // VRrs_5.16 //
prativāpaḥ galitasya dhātoḥ dravyāntareṇa avacūrṇanam // VRrsBo_5.17ab;1
prativāpena kanakaṃ suciraṃ tiṣṭhati drutam // VRrs_5.17 //
bhāvitaṃ sadṛśaṃ hema karoti jalavaddrutam // VRrs_5.18 //

etadbhasma suvarṇajaṃ kaṭughṛtopetaṃ dviguṃjonmitaṃ līḍhaṃ hanti nṛṇāṃ
kṣayāgnisadanaṃ śvāsaṃ ca kāsārucim /

ojodhātuvivardhanaṃ balakaraṃ pāṇḍvāmayadhvaṃsanaṃ pathyaṃ sarvaviṣāpahaṃ
garaharaṃ duṣṭagrahaṇyādinut // VRrs_5.19 //
balaṃ ca vīryaṃ harate narāṇāṃ rogavrajaṃ kopayatīva kāye /

asaukhyakāraṃ ca sadaiva hemāpakvaṃ sadoṣaṃ maraṇaṃ karoti // VRrs_5.20
//
tatspṛṣṭaṃ hi sakṛdvyādhināśanaṃ dehināṃ bhavet // VRrs_5.22 //
khanijaṃ kathyate tajjñaiḥ paramaṃ hi rasāyanam // VRrs_5.23 //
ghanaṃ svacchaṃ guru snigdhaṃ dāhe chede sitaṃ mṛdu /
śaṃkhābhaṃ masṛṇaṃ sphoṭarahitaṃ rajataṃ śubham // VRrs_5.25 //
dāhe raktaṃ ca pītaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ rūkṣaṃ sphuṭaṃ laghu /
sthūlāṅgaṃ karkaśāṅgaṃ ca rajataṃ tyājyamaṣṭadhā // VRrs_5.26 //

rūpyaṃ vipākamadhuraṃ tuvarāmlasāraṃ śītaṃ saraṃ paramalekhanakaṃ ca rūpyam
/

snigdhaṃ ca vātakaphajijjaṭharāgnidīpi balyaṃ paraṃ sthiravayaskaraṇaṃ ca
medhyam // VRrs_5.27 //
raupyaṃ śītaṃ kaṣāyāmlaṃ snigdhaṃ vātaharaṃ guru /
taile takre gavāṃ mūtre hyāranāle kulatthaje /
aśuddhaṃ na mṛtaṃ tāraṃ śuddhaṃ māryamato budhaiḥ // VRrs_5.30 //
tāraṃ trivāraṃ nikṣiptaṃ taile jyotiṣmatībhave // VRrs_5.31 //
itthaṃ saṃśodhitaṃ rūpyaṃ yojanīyaṃ rasādiṣu // VRrs_5.33 //

atrāyaṃ vidhiḥ nāgabhasmaṭaṅkaṇacūrṇe jalena piṣṭvā tatpiṇḍena mṛtkharparaṃ
paritaḥ ālavālaṃ racayitvā tanmadhye samasīsacūrṇapiṣṭaraupyaṃ nikṣipya
tāvat bhastrayā dhamet yāvat sīsakṣayo na bhavediti // VRrsBo_5.33;3
ūrdhvādho gandhakaṃ dattvā mūṣāmadhye nirudhya ca // VRrs_5.34 //
svāṃgaśītāṃ ca tāṃ piṣṭiṃ sāmlatālena marditām /

bhasmībhūtaṃ rajatamamalaṃ tatsamau vyomabhānū sarvaistulyaṃ trikaṭu savaraṃ
sāraghājyena yuktam /

līḍhaṃ prātaḥ kṣapayatitarāṃ yakṣmapāṇḍūdarārśaḥ śvāsaṃ kāsaṃ nayanajarujaḥ
pittarogānaśeṣān // VRrs_5.41 //
khaner nepāladeśasaṃnihitatvād vā nepāleti saṃjñā // VRrsṬī_5.42;5

yathā mlecchadhātur aspaṣṭaśabde tathā spaṣṭaśabdaraktavarṇatvānmleccham iti
saṃjñā // VRrsṬī_5.42;8
kṣālitaṃ ca punaḥ kṛṣṇam etanmlecchakatāmrakam // VRrs_5.43 //

sadalaṃ sapattraṃ paṭalasaṃyutam iti yāvat dalaṃ jor iti loke iti bhāvamiśraḥ
// VRrsBo_5.45ab;1
rūkṣāṅgaṃ sadalaṃ tāmraṃ neṣyate rasakarmaṇi // VRrs_5.45 //

tāmraṃ tiktakaṣāyakaṃ ca madhuraṃ pāke+atha vīryoṣṇakaṃ sāmlaṃ
pittakaphāpahaṃ jaṭhararukkuṣṭhāmajantvantakṛt /

ūrdhvādhaḥ pariśodhanaṃ viṣayakṛt sthaulyāpahaṃ kṣutkaraṃ
durnāmakṣayapāṇḍurogaśamanaṃ netryaṃ paraṃ lekhanam // VRrs_5.46 //
vāntimūrcchābhramotkledaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ śūlaṃ karoti tat // VRrs_5.47 //
śudhyate nātra saṃdeho māraṇaṃ cāpyathocyate // VRrs_5.52 //
tadgolaṃ sūraṇasyāntā ruddhvā sarvatra lepayet // VRrs_5.54 //
vāntiṃ bhrāntiṃ virekaṃ ca na karoti kadācana // VRrs_5.55 //
kṣiptvā rasena bhāṇḍe taddviguṇaṃ dehi gandhakam // VRrs_5.56 //
samyaṅ nirudhya bhāṇḍe tamagniṃ jvālaya yāmakam /
piṣṭvā tulyena balinā bhāṇḍamadhye vinikṣipet // VRrs_5.58 //
mukhe śarāvakaṃ dattvā vahniṃ yāmacatuṣṭayam // VRrs_5.59 //
tadardhāṃśena tālena śilayā ca tadardhayā // VRrs_5.63 //

tattadrogaharānupānasahitatāmraṃ dvivallonmitaṃ saṃlīḍhaṃ pariṇāmaśūlamudaraṃ
śūlaṃ ca pāṇḍujvaram /

gulmaplīhayakṛtkṣayāgnisadanaṃ mehaṃ ca mūlāmayaṃ duṣṭāṃ ca grahaṇīṃ hared
dhruvam idaṃ śrīsomanāthābhidham // VRrs_5.66 //
muṃḍaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca kāṃtaṃ ca triprakāramayaḥ smṛtam // VRrs_5.67 //
mṛdu kuṇṭhaṃ kaḍāraṃ ca trividhaṃ muṇḍamucyate // VRrs_5.68 //
hataṃ yatprasared duḥkhāttatkuṇṭhaṃ madhyamaṃ smṛtam // VRrs_5.70 //
yaddhataṃ bhajyate bhaṃge kṛṣṇaṃ syāttatkaḍārakam // VRrs_5.71 //

gulmāmavātajaṭharārtiharaṃ pradīpi śophāpahaṃ rudhirakṛtkhalu koṣṭhaśodhi //
VRrs_5.72 //
aśuddhalohaṃ na hitaṃ niṣevaṇād āyurbalaṃ kāntivināśi niścitam /

hṛdi prapīḍāṃ tanute hyapāṭavaṃ rujaṃ karotyeva viśodhya mārayet // VRrs_5.73
//
kharaṃ sāraṃ ca hṛnnālaṃ tārāvaṭṭaṃ ca vājiram /

pogaraṃ kuñcitālakavat taraṅgāyitaṃ tena unmuktaṃ tadrahitam ityarthaḥ //
VRrsBo_5.75;1

yat paruṣaṃ kaṭhoraṃ pogaronmuktaṃ pogaram alakavat kuṭilarekhās tābhir
muktaṃ tadrahitam ityarthaḥ // VRrsṬī_5.75;1
cikuraṃ bhaṅguraṃ lohāt pogaraṃ tatparaṃ matam // VRrs_5.78 //

kharalakṣaṇe pogaronmuktam ityuktam ataḥ pogarasya paryāyādikam āha
aṅgakṣayeti // VRrsBo_5.78;1

tritvaṃ cātra pogaram apekṣya bodhyaṃ tena aṅgakṣayā vaṅgaṃ pogaraṃ ca
ityekārtham // VRrsBo_5.78;2

atra saptamyarthe pañcamīti boddhavyam yat cikuraṃ bhaṅguraṃ
kuñcitakuntalavadbhaṅgīviśeṣaḥ ityarthaḥ // VRrsBo_5.78;5

ato bodhārthaṃ tatparyāyān āha aṅgachāyā ca vaṅgaṃ cikuraṃ ca iti
pogarasyābhidhātrayaṃ nāmatrayam asti // VRrsṬī_5.78;3
evaṃ ca nāmānyetāni viśiṣṭākāratejasa ityarthaḥ // VRrsṬī_5.78;4
vaṅgasyeva rekhānāṃ śvetacchāyātvād vaṅgamiti saṃjñā // VRrsṬī_5.78;5
kāntīnāṃ cikurākāratvāt keśākāratvāccikuram ityapi nāma // VRrsṬī_5.78;6

yad uktam eva kharalohaṃ tadyadi lohādbhaṅguraṃ lohamayaghanaghātena
bhaṅguraṃ bhavati paraṃtu pogaraṃ pogaraviśiṣṭaṃ dṛśyeta tarhi tat
kharaloham api paramuttamaṃ matam // VRrsṬī_5.78;7
nicitaṃ śyāmalāṅgaṃ ca vājīraṃ tatprakīrtyate // VRrs_5.79 //

rūkṣaṃ syāt kharalohakaṃ samadhuraṃ pāke+atha vīrye himaṃ tiktoṣṇaṃ
kaphapittakuṣṭhajaṭharaplīhāmapāṃḍvartinut /

sadyaḥ śūlayakṛdgadakṣayajarāmehāmavātāpahaṃ dīptaṃ cātirasāyanaṃ balakaraṃ
durnāmadāhāpaham // VRrs_5.81 //
bhrāmakaṃ cumbakaṃ caiva karṣakaṃ drāvakaṃ tathā /
evaṃ caturvidhaṃ kāntaṃ romakāntaṃ ca pañcamam // VRrs_5.83 //

tasya cokto vyastaḥ samasto vā bhedo+ayaṃ jāraṇāyāṃ sakaladhātubhakṣaṇārthaṃ
pāradasya mukharūpo bhavatītyāha ekadvitrīti // VRrsṬī_5.84ab;1

kevalabhrāmakasattvasya prathamaṃ yathāvidhijāraṇenāpi pāradasya mukhaṃ
bhavati // VRrsṬī_5.84ab;2

bhrāmakacumbakayoḥ sattvadvayasyaikīkṛtasya yathāvidhijāraṇena pāradamukhaṃ
kṛtaṃ cet saṃyuktabhedadvayaviśiṣṭaṃ tat kāntaṃ dvimukham ucyate //
VRrsṬī_5.84ab;6

vijātīyadravyagrāsāntarasahitam apyetat prathamaṃ jāritaṃ cenmukhaṃ
bhavatītyataḥ sarvatomukham ityuktam // VRrsṬī_5.84ab;8
pītaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tathā raktaṃ trivarṇaṃ syātpṛthak pṛthak /

sparśavedhi sparśamātreṇaiva vedhakārakaṃ rasendrasya
vedhākhyasaṃskārasaṃpādakaṃ vā ityarthaḥ // VRrsBo_5.84;1
raktavarṇaṃ tathā cāpi rasabandhe praśasyate // VRrs_5.85 //
bhrāmakaṃ tu kaniṣṭhaṃ syāccumbakaṃ madhyamaṃ tathā /
uttamaṃ karṣakaṃ caiva drāvakaṃ cottamottamam // VRrs_5.86 //
sākṣād yaddrāvayellohaṃ tatkāntaṃ drāvakaṃ bhavet // VRrs_5.89 //
tadromakāntaṃ sphuṭitād yato romodgamo bhavet // VRrs_5.90 //
rase rasāyane caiva karṣakaṃ drāvakaṃ hitam // VRrs_5.92 //

pātre yasya prasarati jale tailabindurna lipto gandhaṃ hiṅgustyajati ca tathā
tiktatāṃ nimbakalkaḥ /

pāke dugdhaṃ bhavati śikharākārakaṃ naiti bhūmau kāntaṃ lauhaṃ tadidamuditaṃ
lakṣaṇoktaṃ ca nānyat // VRrs_5.95 //

kāntāyo +atirasāyanottarataraṃ svasthe cirāyuḥpradaṃ snigdhaṃ mehaharaṃ
tridoṣaśamanaṃ śūlāmamūlāpaham /

gulmaplīhayakṛtkṣayāmayaharaṃ pāṇḍūdaravyādhinut tiktoṣṇaṃ himavīryakaṃ
kimaparaṃ yogena sarvārtinut // VRrs_5.96 //
tasmātsarvaprayatnena śuddhaṃ lohaṃ ca mārayet // VRrs_5.97 //
nāyaḥ pacetpañcapalād arvāg ūrdhvaṃ trayodaśāt // VRrs_5.98 //
ādau mantrastataḥ karma kartavyaṃ mantra ucyate // VRrs_5.99 //
oṃ amṛtodbhavāya svāhā anena mantreṇa lohamāraṇam /
kāntaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ tatra tadapyevaṃ guṇottaram // VRrs_5.100 //
tatkvāthe pādaśeṣe tu lohasya palapañcakam // VRrs_5.102 //
evaṃ pralīyate doṣo girijo lohasambhavaḥ // VRrs_5.103 //
recitaṃ ghṛtasaṃyuktaṃ kṣiptvāyaḥ kharpare pacet // VRrs_5.106 //
piṣṭvā piṣṭvā pacedevaṃ pañcavāramataḥ param // VRrs_5.107 //
evaṃ bhasmīkṛtaṃ lohaṃ tattadrogeṣu yojayet // VRrs_5.113 //
mriyate nātra saṃdeho dattvā dattvaiva hiṅgulam // VRrs_5.117 //
piṣṭvā dattvaudanaṃ kiṃciccakrikāṃ pravidhāya ca // VRrs_5.119 //
raktavarṇaṃ hi tadbhasma yojanīyaṃ yathāyatham // VRrs_5.120 //
bahuvāraṃ vinikṣiptaṃ mriyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // VRrs_5.126 //
evaṃ śuddhāni lohāni piṣṭānyamlena kenacit // VRrs_5.130 //
śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ dvidhā gandhaṃ khallena kṛtakajjalam /
kāntaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca muṃḍaṃ ca nirutthaṃ jāyate mṛtam // VRrs_5.135 //
siddhayogo hyayaṃ khyātaḥ siddhānāṃ sumukhāgataḥ // VRrs_5.136 //

etasmād apunarbhavaṃ hi bhasitaṃ lohasya divyāmṛtaṃ samyak siddharasāyanaṃ
trikaṭukīvellājyamadhvanvitam /

hanyānniṣkamitaṃ jarāmaraṇajavyādhīṃśca satputradaṃ diṣṭe śrīgiriśena
kālayavanodbhūtyai purā tatpituḥ // VRrs_5.138 //

gulmaplīhaviṣāpahaṃ balakaraṃ kuṣṭhāgnimāndyapraṇut saukhyālambirasāyanaṃ
mṛtiharaṃ kiṭṭaṃ ca kāntādivat // VRrs_5.139 //
mṛtāni lohāni rasībhavanti nighnanti yuktāni mahāmayāṃśca /
śoṣayettasya vāpena tīkṣṇaṃ mūṣāgataṃ dravet // VRrs_5.142 //
vāpena salilasadṛśaṃ karoti mūṣāgataṃ tīkṣṇam // VRrs_5.143 //
drute lohe pratīvāpo deyo lohāṣṭakaṃ dravet // VRrs_5.145 //
tena pravāpamātreṇa lauhaṃ tiṣṭhati sūtavat // VRrs_5.146 //
aśuddhalohaṃ na hitaṃ niṣevaṇād āyurbalaṃ kāntivināśi niścitam /

hṛdi prapīḍāṃ tanute hyapāṭavaṃ rujaṃ karotyeva viśodhya mārayet //
VRrs_5.147 //
tasmāt kāntaṃ sadā sevyaṃ jarāmṛtyuharaṃ nṛṇām // VRrs_5.148 //

ayaḥsamānaṃ na hi kiṃcid anyadrasāyanaṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ hi jantoḥ // VRrs_5.149
//
taccūrṇaṃ jāyate peṣyaṃ maṇḍūro+ayaṃ prayojayet // VRrs_5.151 //
ye guṇā mārite muṇḍe te guṇā muṇḍakiṭṭake /
khuraṃ tatra guṇaiḥ śreṣṭhaṃ miśrakaṃ na hitaṃ matam // VRrs_5.153 //

niḥśabdaṃ pattrībhūtamapi śabdarahitaṃ pattrībhūtaṃ raṅgāntaraṃ yathā
saśabdaṃ bhavati tathā na ityarthaḥ // VRrsBo_5.154ab;1
niḥśabdaṃ khuravaṃgaṃ syāt miśrakaṃ śyāmaśubhrakam // VRrs_5.154 //
viśudhyati trivāreṇa khuravaṃgaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // VRrs_5.156 //
śudhyati nāgo vaṃgo ghoṣo ravirātape+api munisaṃkhyaiḥ /
pradrāvya kharpare vaṃgaṃ ṣoḍaśāṃśaṃ rasaṃ kṣipet /
tālena puṭitaṃ paścānmriyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // VRrs_5.161 //
dāḍimasya mayūrasya rasena ca pṛthak pṛthak /
niścitaṃ tena naśyanti mehā viṃśatibhedakāḥ // VRrs_5.168 //
paṭolaṃ tiktatuṇḍīraṃ takraṃ pathyāya śasyate // VRrs_5.169 //
pūtigandhaṃ bahiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ śuddhaṃ sīsamato+anyathā // VRrs_5.170 //
nāgaḥ śuddho bhavedevaṃ mūrchāsphoṭādi nācaret // VRrs_5.172 //
taṃ ca vaktraṃ vinā sarvaṃ gopayedyatnato mṛdā // VRrs_5.173 //
drute nāge kṣipetsūtaṃ śuddhaṃ karṣamitaṃ śubham /
gharṣayitvā kṣipetkṣāramekaikaṃ hi palaṃ palam // VRrs_5.175 //

mahārājagiriḥ śākaviśeṣaḥ rājaśākam itiyāvat sa tu laghusthūlabhedena
dvividhaḥ atra ca sthūlo grāhyaḥ // VRrsBo_5.176ab;1
dāḍimasya mayūrasya kṣiptvā kṣāraṃ pṛthak pṛthak // VRrs_5.176 //

atredaṃ kāryaṃ vakrākārāṃ cullīṃ kṛtvā tadupari ghaṭamekaṃ vakramukhaṃ kṛtvā
sthāpayet tato vaktramātraṃ vihāya kṛtsnaṃ ghaṭāvayavaṃ mṛllepenācchādayet
bhṛṣṭayantrākhye+asmin yantre viṃśatipalamānaṃ śuddhaṃ sīsakaṃ dattvā
tīvrottāpena dravīkuryāt tataḥ tasmin karṣapramāṇaṃ śodhitapāradaṃ prakṣipya
darvyā ghaṭṭayet miśrībhūte ca tasmin pratyekaṃ palamānaṃ arjunādīnāṃ kṣāraṃ
pṛthak pṛthak dattvā lauhadarvyā dṛḍhaṃ ghaṭṭayan tīvrāgninā viṃśatirātraṃ
pacet // VRrsBo_5.178;1

tiryagākārā tiraścīnā yā dīrghā cullī āhāḷa iti mahārāṣṭrabhāsāyāṃ prasiddhā
tasyāṃ ghaṭaṃ tiryagvaktram etādṛśaṃ ghaṭaṃ nyased adhiśrayet //
VRrsṬī_5.178;1

taṃ ghaṭaṃ ca vaktraṃ vinā bāhye samaṃ tato+aṅgulasthūlaṃ mṛdā gopayellepayet
// VRrsṬī_5.178;2

bhṛṣṭayantrākhye tasmin viṃśatipalamitaṃ sīsaṃ vinikṣipet //
VRrsṬī_5.178;3

tato dorbhyāṃ lohadarvyā vighaṭṭayaṃścālayan viṃśatirātraparyantaṃ tīvrāgninā
pacet // VRrsṬī_5.178;5

tena vidhinā nāgabhasma raktavarṇaṃ kapotacchāyaṃ kṛṣṇamiśraraktavarṇaṃ vā
bhavet // VRrsṬī_5.178;6

tāpasphoṭādikaratvarūpadoṣarahitaṃ bhasmībhūtaṃ nāgaṃ rasāyanaṃ bhavati //
VRrsṬī_5.178;7
jambīrair āranālairvā piṣṭvā ruddhvā puṭe pacet // VRrs_5.181 //
evaṃ ṣaṣṭipuṭaiḥ pakvo nāgaḥ syātsunirutthitaḥ // VRrs_5.182 //
pādaṃ pādaṃ kṣipedbhasma śulbasya vimalasya ca // VRrs_5.184 //
śvāsaṃ kāsaṃ kṣayaṃ pāṇḍuṃ śvayathuṃ śītakajvaram // VRrs_5.188 //
rītikā kākatuṇḍī ca dvividhaṃ pittalaṃ bhavet // VRrs_5.190 //
saṃtāpya kāṃjike kṣiptā tāmrābhā rītikā matā // VRrs_5.191 //
evaṃ yā jāyate kṛṣṇā kākatuṇḍīti sā matā // VRrs_5.192 //
gurvī mṛdvī ca pītābhā sārāṅgī tāḍanakṣamā /
susnigdhā masṛṇāṅgī ca rītiretādṛśī śubhā // VRrs_5.195 //
pūtigandhā tathā laghvī rītirneṣṭā rasādiṣu // VRrs_5.196 //
rītirāyāti bhasmatvaṃ tato yojyā yathāyatham // VRrs_5.198 //
tāmravanmāraṇaṃ tasyāḥ kṛtvā sarvatra yojayet // VRrs_5.199 //
trayaṃ samāṃśakaṃ tulyaṃ vyoṣaṃ jantughnasaṃyutam // VRrs_5.200 //
chāgena kṛṣṇavarṇena mattena taruṇena ca // VRrs_5.202 //
talliptaṃ kharpare dagdhaṃ drutiṃ muñcati śobhanām /
nirmalaṃ dāharaktaṃ ca ṣoḍhā kāṃsyaṃ praśasyate // VRrs_5.205 //
tatpītaṃ dahane tāmraṃ kharaṃ rūkṣaṃ ghanāsaham /
kāṃsyaṃ laghu ca tiktoṣṇaṃ lekhanaṃ dṛkprasādanam /
taptaṃ kāṃsyaṃ gavāṃ mūtre vāpitaṃ pariśudhyati // VRrs_5.209 //
mriyate gandhatālābhyāṃ nirutthaṃ pañcabhiḥ puṭaiḥ // VRrs_5.210 //
rucyaṃ tvacyaṃ kṛmighnaṃ ca netryaṃ malaviśodhanam // VRrs_5.213 //
amlena varjitaṃ cātidīpanaṃ pācanaṃ hitam // VRrs_5.214 //
teṣu teṣviha yogeṣu yojanīyaṃ yathāvidhi // VRrs_5.216 //

mahārasādyeṣu kaṭhoradehaṃ bhasmīkṛtaṃ syāt khalu sūtayogyam // VRrs_5.218
//
nirudhya dṛḍhamūṣāyāṃ dvidaṇḍaṃ pradhamed dṛḍham // VRrs_5.221 //
dvitrimūṣāsu caikasyāṃ sattvaṃ bhavati niścitam // VRrs_5.224 //
upoṣitaṃ mayūraṃ vā śūraṃ vā caraṇāyudham // VRrs_5.226 //
kṣārāmlaiḥ saha saṃpeṣya viśoṣya ca kharātape // VRrs_5.227 //
tataḥ kharparake kṣiptvā bharjayitvā maṣīṃ caret /

khoṭaṃ rasajāraṇabandhanadravyaviśeṣaṃ bhūnāgasattvasya rasajārakatvāt atra
khoṭaśabdena ravakareṇurūpaṃ bhūnāgasattvaṃ bodhyam // VRrsBo_5.229ab;1
suvarṇamānavad dhmātvā ravaṃ kṛtvā niyojayet // VRrs_5.230 //

bhūnāgodbhavasattvamuttamamidaṃ śrīsomadevoditaṃ dattaṃ pādamitaṃ
dviśāṇakanakenaikaṃ gatenormikām /

taddhautāmbuvilepitaṃ sthiracarodbhūtaṃ viṣaṃ netraruk śūlaṃ mūlagadaṃ ca
karṇajarujo hanyāt prasūtigraham // VRrs_5.231 //
tattailaṃ ghṛtavatstyānaṃ grāhyaṃ tattu yathāvidhi // VRrs_5.232 //
ekarātroṣitaṃ tattu piṇḍīkṛtya tataḥ param // VRrs_5.235 //
tāṃ ca piṇḍīṃ dṛḍhe vastre baddhvā niṣpīḍya kāṣṭhataḥ // VRrs_5.236 //
karkoṭī karkoṭakaṃ kāṃkola iti bhāṣā // VRrsBo_5.238;1
mūlakvāthaiḥ kumāryāśca tailaṃ jaipālajaṃ haret // VRrs_5.241 //
na krameṇa vinā śāstraṃ na śāstreṇa vinā kramaḥ /
śāstraṃ kramayutaṃ jñātvā yaḥ karoti sa siddhibhāk // VRrs_6.2 //
ityevaṃ lakṣaṇairyuktāḥ śiṣyāḥ syuḥ sūtasiddhaye // VRrs_6.6 //
kurvanti yadi mohena nāśayanti svakaṃ dhanam /
iha loke sukhaṃ nāsti paraloke tathaiva ca // VRrs_6.9 //
bhūḥ samā tatra kartavyā sudṛḍhā darpaṇopamā /
tanmadhye vedikā ramyā kartavyā lakṣaṇānvitā // VRrs_6.16 //
amlena mardayed yāmaṃ tena liṅgaṃ tu kārayet // VRrs_6.17 //

vāṅmayī śrīḥ kāmarājaśaktibījaṃ rasāṅkuśāyai namo dvādaśārṇaiṣā jñeyā vidyā
rasāṅkuśā // VRrs_6.24 //
eva nityārcanaṃ tatra kartavyaṃ rasasiddhaye // VRrs_6.26 //
tilājyaiḥ pāyasaiḥ puṣpaiḥ śatapuṣpādikaiḥ pṛthak // VRrs_6.30 //
yasyāstu kuñcitāḥ keśāḥ śyāmā yā padmalocanā /
surūpā taruṇī bhinnā vistīrṇajaghanā śubhā // VRrs_6.32 //
kṛṣṇapakṣe puṣpavatī sā nārī kālinī smṛtā /
rasabandhe prayoge ca uttamā sā rasāyane // VRrs_6.34 //
tadabhāve surūpā tu yā kācit taruṇāṅganā /
karṣaikaikaṃ prabhāte tu sā bhavetkālinīsamā // VRrs_6.35 //
evaṃ śaktiyuto yo +asau dīkṣayet taṃ gurūttamaḥ /

oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ hrūṃ adyoratara prasphuṭa 2 prakaṭa 2 kaha 2 śamaya 2 jāta 2
daha 2 pātaya 2 oṃ hrīṃ hraiṃ hrauṃ hrūṃ aghorāya phaṭ imam aghoramantraṃ tu
auṃ kāmarājaśaktibījarasāṅkuśāyai ājñayā vidyāṃ rasāṅkuśām /
ṣaṭkoṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tatra sindūreṇa dvihastakam // VRrs_6.40 //
kamalaṃ caturasraṃ ca caturdvāraiḥ suśobhitam // VRrs_6.41 //
bhūnāgaḥ śaktayaścaitāḥ ṣaṭkoṇe pūjayet kramāt // VRrs_6.43 //
rājāvarto gairikaṃ ca khyātā uparasā amī /
rasakaṃ vimalā tāpyaṃ capalā tuttham añjanam /
hiṅgulaṃ sasyakaṃ caiva khyātā ete mahārasāḥ /
etāni dvārabāhye tu mūlamantreṇa pūjayet // VRrs_6.49 //
vāṅmāyā hrīṃ tataḥ kṣeṃ ca kṣmaśca pañcākṣaro manuḥ /
sarveṣāṃ rasasiddhānāṃ nāma saṃkīrtayet tadā // VRrs_6.50 //
āgamo nāgabuddhiś ca khaṇḍaḥ kāpāliko mataḥ // VRrs_6.52 //
bāṇāsuro muniśreṣṭho govindaḥ kapilo baliḥ // VRrs_6.53 //
ete sarve tu sūtendrā rasasiddhā mahābalāḥ /
vaidyāḥ pūjyāḥ prayatnena tataḥ kuryādrasārcanam // VRrs_6.55 //

samyaksādhanasodyamā guruyutā rājājñayālaṃkṛtā nānākarmaparāṅmukhā rasaparāś
cāḍhyā janaiścārthitāḥ /

mātrāyantrasupākakarmakuśalāḥ sarvauṣadhe kovidāḥ teṣāṃ sidhyati nānyathā
vidhibalācchrīpāradaḥ pāradaḥ // VRrs_6.60 //
rājñe vaiśyāya vṛddhyarthaṃ dāsyārtham itarasya ca // VRrs_6.61 //
rase tuṣṭe kriyāḥ sarvāḥ sidhyantyeva na saṃśayaḥ // VRrs_6.62 //
bhaved vīryavatī guptā nirvīryā ca prakāśanāt // VRrs_6.63 //
vahnikarmāṇi cāgneye yāmye pāṣāṇakarma ca // VRrs_7.3 //
cālanī ca kaṭatrāṇi śalākā hi ca kuṇḍalī // VRrs_7.9 //
cālanī trividhā proktā tatsvarūpaṃ ca kathyate /
kīrtitā sā sadā sthūladravyāṇāṃ gālane hitā // VRrs_7.10 //

tatra dīrghāḥ śalākāstiraścīnāśca vaṃśamayyaś catuṣkoṇakāṣṭhapaṭṭikāchidreṣu
bahirnirgatāgrāḥ sūtrabaddhāḥ kāryāḥ // VRrsṬī_7.10;2
tayā pracālanaṃ kuryāddhartuṃ sūkṣmataraṃ rajaḥ // VRrs_7.13 //
kuṇḍalīṃ kuṇḍalākārāṃ vartulāṃ tṛtīyāṃ cālanīṃ vidadhyāt // VRrsṬī_7.13;1

aratnivistārā prasāritakaniṣṭhāṅgulibaddhamuṣṭihastapramāṇāyatā
caturaṅgulavistṛtakarṇikārādivalkalanirmitā aratnivistāraveṣṭanī yuktā
chāgacarmamaṇḍitā aśvapucchakeśasūkṣmavastraracitataladeśā
sūkṣmataradravyacālanārtham aparavidhā cālanītyarthaḥ // VRrsBo_7.13;2
tadapekṣayā sthūlāḥ śvetāḥ kaṇāḥ sitopalāḥ // VRrsṬī_7.14a-d;2
śikhitrā govaraṃ caiva śarkarā ca sitopalā // VRrs_7.14 //
sitopalā kaṭhinī phulakaḍī iti bhāṣā // VRrsBo_7.14;1
śikhitrāḥ pāvakocchiṣṭā aṅgārāḥ kokilā matāḥ // VRrs_7.15 //
saṃprati teṣāṃ sāmānyam avāntarabhedaṃ cāha śikhitrā iti // VRrsṬī_7.15;2

pāvakena vahninā bhuktvā ucchiṣṭāḥ parityaktā aṅgārāḥ śikhitrāḥ kokilāśca
matāḥ // VRrsṬī_7.15;3

viśeṣastvittham vahninā bhuktvā svayaṃ tyaktāḥ śikhitrā haṭhāt
pratikūlavāyudhūlikṣepamṛttikādinipīḍanādinā yatnena vahnito viyojitā
aṅgārāḥ kokilā matā iti ceti // VRrsṬī_7.15;4

te prajvalitā jalena vinā nirvāṇāḥ kṛtā vahnimuktāḥ kṛtāḥ //
VRrsṬī_7.15;5
kokilāś cetitāṅgārā nirvāṇāḥ payasā vinā // VRrs_7.16 //

śikhitralakṣaṇe kokilā uktāḥ ataḥ kokilāśabdasyārtham āha kokilā iti //
VRrsBo_7.16;1

cetitāṅgārāḥ taptāṅgārāḥ payaso vinā svayaṃ nirvāṇāḥ śāntāḥ cet te aṅgārāḥ
kokilāḥ matāḥ kokilāḥ kaylā iti bhāṣā // VRrsBo_7.16;2
piṣṭakaṃ chagaṇaṃ chāṇam upalaṃ cotpalaṃ tathā /
caṣakaṃ pānapātraṃ vāṭī glās iti prasiddham // VRrsBo_7.17;1
kūpikā kupikā siddhā golā caiva giriṇḍikā // VRrs_7.19 //
caṣakaṃ ca kaṭorī ca vāṭikā khārikā tathā /
kañcolī grāhikā ceti nāmānyekārthakāni hi // VRrs_7.20 //
anyathā tadgataṃ tejaḥ parigṛhṇanti bhairavāḥ // VRrs_7.23 //
rasapākāvasānaṃ hi sadāghoraṃ ca jāpayet // VRrs_7.25 //
sodyamāḥ śucayaḥ śūrā baliṣṭhāḥ paricārakāḥ // VRrs_7.26 //
kṛṣṇarekhākaro vaidyo dagdhahastaḥ sa ucyate // VRrs_7.29 //
guruvākyaratā nityaṃ dhātuvādeṣu te śubhāḥ // VRrs_7.33 //
hā raso naṣṭamityuktvā sevetānyatra taṃ rasam // VRrs_7.36 //
rasasiddho bhavenmartyo dātā bhoktā na yācakaḥ /
jarāmukto jagatpūjyo divyakāntiḥ sadā sukhī // VRrs_7.37 //
paribhāṣā rasendrasya śāstraiḥ siddhaiśca bhāṣitā // VRrs_8.1 //

ardhaṃ siddharasasya tailaghṛtayorlehasya bhāgo+aṣṭamaḥ
saṃsiddhākhilalohacūrṇavaṭakādīnāṃ tathā saptamaḥ /

yo dīyeta bhiṣagvarāya gadibhirnirdiśya dhanvantarim sarvārogyasukhāptaye
nigadito bhāgaḥ sa dhanvantareḥ // VRrs_8.2 //
vaṇigbhyo gṛhyate vaidyai rudrabhāgaḥ sa ucyate // VRrs_8.3 //
dāpayellubdhadhīr vaidyaḥ sa syād viśvāsaghātakaḥ // VRrs_8.4 //
svarṇaṃ rūpyaṃ ca tāmraṃ ca raṅgaṃ jasadameva ca /
sīsaṃ lohaṃ ca saptaite dhātavo girisaṃbhavāḥ /
teṣāṃ bhāgo rasasamo viṣamo vā yathopadeśaṃ grāhyaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.5;5

saiva kajjalī dravaṃ dattvā marditā cedrasapaṅkasaṃjñāṃ labhate //
VRrsṬī_8.5;6
sadravā marditā saiva rasapaṅka iti smṛtā // VRrs_8.6 //
arkāṃśatulyād rasato +atha gandhān niṣkārdhatulyāt truṭiśo +abhi khalle /
arkātape tīvratare vimardyāt piṣṭī bhavet sā navanītarūpā // VRrs_8.7 //

tatsaṃkhyākā ye+aṃśā bhāgā niṣkārdhātmakā bhāgāstattulyād rasāt pāradāt //
VRrsṬī_8.7;4

tena gandhakasya yo bhāgastato dvādaśaguṇitaḥ pāradabhāgo+atra grāhya
ityarthaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.7;6

yathoktabhāgam ubhayaṃ pṛthaggṛhītvā tīvre+arkātape lohe khalve truṭiśa
īṣanmānena punaḥ punardattvā mardanānnavanītarūpā mṛdulā navanītākhyā ca
piṣṭī bhavati // VRrsṬī_8.7;7
atra navanītākhyo gandhako bhakṣyaḥ pāradaśca bhakṣakaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.7;8
sa tu nānārūpapiṣṭīṣu samāna eva // VRrsṬī_8.7;9
khalle vimardya gandhena dugdhena saha pāradam /
peṣaṇāt piṣṭatāṃ yāti sā piṣṭīti matā paraiḥ // VRrs_8.8 //

caturthāṃśaṃ śuddhaṃ svarṇacūrṇaṃ pāradamadhye prakṣipya taptalohakhalve
+amlarasena jambīrādijena yāmaparyantaṃ dviyāmaparyantaṃ vā mardanena
saṃjātā cūrṇarūpā sā hemapiṣṭikāpi pātanopayogena siddhikaratvāt
pātanapiṣṭir ityabhidhīyate // VRrsṬī_8.9;2

tādṛśīṃ piṣṭiṃ kṛtvā pātanāyantre +adhasthapātrāntastala ūrdhvabhājane vā
liptvā praharacatuṣṭayaparyantam agniyogenordhvaṃ pāradaṃ pātayet //
VRrsṬī_8.9;3

tadanantaraṃ pāradāt pṛthagbhūtvādhobhāgasthatatsvarṇacūrṇam
ūrdhvalagnapāradaṃ ca yantrād bahirniṣkāsyaikīkṛtya
punastaptalohakhalve+amlena rasena pūrvavanmardayitvā pūrvavat pātayet //
VRrsṬī_8.9;4

evaṃ śatadhā pātanena kṣīṇo gatirahito nirdoṣaḥ pāradaḥ sthiro+agnisaho
bhavati // VRrsṬī_8.9;5
samutthitaṃ ca bahuśaḥ sā kṛṣṭī hematārayoḥ // VRrs_8.10 //

samutthitam iti antarbhūtaṇyarthaprayogas tena samutthāpitaṃ śoṣitamityartha
ūrdhvapātanāyantre sādhitamityartho vā // VRrsBo_8.10;2
svarṇaraupyayoḥ sā kriyā kṛṣṭīti bodhyam // VRrsBo_8.10;5

rasādibhiḥ saha svarṇaṃ vā raupyaṃ vā kenacinmārakadravyeṇa saṃmardya bahuśaḥ
ātape śoṣayed athavā rasagandhādibhirmāritaṃ svarṇaṃ raupyaṃ vā bahuvāram
ūrdhvapātanayantreṇa samutthāpayet sā kriyā kṛṣṭī bodhyā //
VRrsBo_8.10;6
piṣṭīṃ kṣipet suvarṇāntar na varṇo hīyate tayā // VRrs_8.11 //

pūrvarītyā kṛtayā suvarṇaraupyayor anyatarakṛṣṭyā saha suvarṇaṃ saṃmardya
puṭanena svarṇasya varṇānyatā na jāyate // VRrsBo_8.11;1
svarṇakṛṣṭyā kṛtaṃ bījaṃ rasasya parirañjanam // VRrs_8.12 //

bījaṃ nirvāpaṇaviśeṣeṇa ityādinā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇo dhātuviśeṣāṇāṃ
vicitrasaṃskāraviśeṣaḥ // VRrsBo_8.12;1

uktaprakāreṇaiva kṛtasvarṇakṛṣṭīnirmitaṃ bījaṃ pāradaṃ rañjayet //
VRrsBo_8.12;2

tairmāritaṃ punaḥ punaḥ pañcamitrasaṃskāreṇa prakṛtyavasthāpannaṃ kṛtam //
VRrsṬī_8.12;4

evaṃ saptavāraṃ daśavāraṃ votthāpitasvarṇatāraṃ ca krameṇa hemakṛṣṭī
tārakṛṣṭī cābhidhīyate // VRrsṬī_8.12;5

rasagandhādiyogena malavyapohanād ujjvalam utkṛṣṭaṃ sārūpyaṃ svarṇaṃ tāraṃ
cetyarthaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.12;6
tāṃ svarṇakṛṣṭīṃ drute hīnavarṇasvarṇe kṣipet // VRrsṬī_8.12;7

tena kṣepeṇa varṇo na hīyate tatsvarṇaṃ hīnavarṇaṃ na dṛśyate //
VRrsṬī_8.12;8

evameva hīnavarṇatāre tārakṛṣṭyāḥ kṣepeṇāpi tāraṃ pūrṇavarṇaṃ
bhavatītyartho+api bodhyaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.12;10

bījaṃ śuddhaṃ svarṇotpādakaṃ lohadhātvādipāradasya pītavarṇatvakaraṃ bhavet
// VRrsṬī_8.12;12

rasahṛdaye+aṣṭamāvabodhe pāradasya kṛṣṭimapi pūjyapādā udājahruḥ //
VRrsṬī_8.12;13

tīkṣṇalauhaṃ tāmraṃ ca agnisaṃtāpena dravīkṛtya
gandhakacūrṇamiśritalakucarase nikṣiped ghanībhūtaṃ taddvayamuttolya punaḥ
drāvayitvā pūrvarase nikṣiped evaṃ saptavārān // VRrsBo_8.13;4
drutamityatra mṛtam iti pāṭho mṛtaṃ bhasmībhūtam // VRrsBo_8.13;5
evaṃ prakriyayā tasmād utkṛṣṭalauhaṃ nirgamiṣyatīti // VRrsBo_8.13;6
rañjanī khalu rūpyasya bījānāmapi rañjanī // VRrs_8.16 //
atha hemaraktītāraraktyor lakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ cāha tāmramiti // VRrsṬī_8.16;1

tīkṣṇalohena samabhāgena saṃyuktam ekīkṛtaṃ tāmraṃ bahuvāraṃ drutaṃ kṛtvā
gandhakasahite lakucarase nirvāpayet // VRrsṬī_8.16;2

tadvallohamiti khyātaṃ tārasya rañjanī drute tasminnikṣepeṇetyarthaḥ //
VRrsṬī_8.16;3

tāraraktīkaraṇārthaṃ tu varalohena tāram eva dhamanenaikīkṛtya raktīkṛtaṃ
kāryaṃ sāpi rūpyasya bījānāṃ ca rañjanī raktavarṇotpādikā //
VRrsṬī_8.16;4
mṛtena vā baddharasena vānyallohena vā sādhitamanyaloham /

sitaṃ ca pītatvamupāgataṃ taddalaṃ hi candrānalayoḥ prasiddham // VRrs_8.17
//
sādhitaṃ vānyalohena sitaṃ pītaṃ ca taddalam // VRrs_8.18 //

saṃprati tāradalasya svarṇadalasya ca lakṣaṇamāha mṛteneti //
VRrsṬī_8.18;1

mṛtena bhasmībhūtena pāradena yena kenaciddravyeṇa baddho yaḥ pāradastena
baddhapāradena mṛtena lohena vā sādhitaṃ saṃskṛtam anyalohaṃ vijātīyaṃ lohaṃ
sitatvam upāgataṃ prāptaṃ śvetavarṇaviśiṣṭam athavā pītatvam upāgataṃ
prāptaṃ pītavarṇaviśiṣṭaṃ bhavet // VRrsṬī_8.18;2

tatkrameṇa candradalam analadalaṃ svarṇadalaṃ śāstre prasiddham //
VRrsṬī_8.18;3
ravā iti nāmnā loke prasiddham // VRrsṬī_8.18;6

svarṇamākṣikeṇa saha māritaṃ tāmraṃ tathā sīsakaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak daśavāraṃ
samutthāpitaṃ kṛtvā tayoḥ pratyekaṃ catuṣpalaṃ ādāya ekīkuryāttataḥ
tadubhayaṃ bhūyaḥ nīlāñjanena saha bhasmīkṛtya saptavāraṃ samutthāpayed evaṃ
ca tayoḥ śulvanāga iti saṃjñā jāyate iti // VRrsBo_8.20;2

samabhāgamākṣikeṇa māritaṃ tāmraṃ pañcamitrasaṃskāreṇa samutthitaṃ kuryāt //
VRrsṬī_8.20;2

evaṃ daśavāraṃ kṛtvā tadvattāmravanmākṣikeṇaiva māritaṃ viśuddhaṃ nāgaṃ
tadubhayaṃ mithaḥ samaṃ catuṣpalamitaṃ gṛhītvā punar nīlāñjanena samabhāgena
māritaṃ pañcamitrasaṃskāreṇa punarutthāpitaṃ kuryāt // VRrsṬī_8.20;3

evaṃ saptavāraṃ māraṇapūrvakotthāpanena saṃśuddham etaddravyadvaṃdvaṃ
rasaśāstre śulbanāgamiti kīrtitam // VRrsṬī_8.20;4

taccūrṇaṃ pāradena samabhāgena śuddhena sahājamūtreṇa saṃmardya vajramūṣāyāṃ
dhmānena jātaṃ khoṭaṃ śodhanagaṇena saha dhmānācchuddhaṃ kṛtvā taṃ
khoṭabaddhaṃ pāradaṃ mukhamadhye yo dhārayettasya mehasamūhanāśo bhavet //
VRrsṬī_8.21;2
lohaṃ lohāntare kṣiptaṃ dhmātaṃ nirvāpitaṃ drave /

yathā jasadaṃ mūṣāyāṃ tāmre nikṣipya dhmānenaikībhūtaṃ patrajādyauṣadhīrase
pītavargajarase vā nikṣepātpittalaṃ bhavati tadvadanyadapi tādṛgvarṇaṃ
saṃkīrṇalohaṃ piñjarīvācyaṃ bhavati // VRrsṬī_8.23;2
yasyā utpattau kāraṇaṃ bījasthāne patrameva bhavati // VRrsṬī_8.23;4
bhāgāḥ ṣoḍaśa tārasya tathā dvādaśa bhāsvataḥ /

ekatrāvartitāḥ ekasminneva pātre yugapad dravīkṛtya āloḍitāḥ //
VRrsBo_8.24;3
nirvāpaṇaṃ tu tatproktaṃ vaidyairnirvāhaṇaṃ khalu // VRrs_8.25 //
āvāhyaṃ vāpanīye ca bhāge dṛṣṭe ca dṛṣṭavat // VRrs_8.26 //

yasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ sādhyalohe nirvāhye lohe drute sati tasmiṃstatrānyalohaṃ
vaṅkanālataḥ prakṣiptaṃ vaṅkanālajadhmānenaiva drutaṃ kṛtvā prakṣiptaṃ
bhavatītyarthaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.26;2

kiṃtu sarvatra tadarthaṃ nirvāhaṇaśabda eva prayukto dṛśyate //
VRrsṬī_8.26;7
etacca nirvāhaṇaṃ prāyo bījādisaṃskārārthaṃ kriyate // VRrsṬī_8.26;8

yathā pāradodare bījānāṃ garbhadrāvaṇayogyatāsaṃpādanārthaṃ
nirvāhaṇasaṃskāraṃ vyājahāra rasahṛdaye /
mṛtanāgaṃ mṛtavaṅgaṃ mṛtavaraśulbaṃ mṛtaṃ tathā tīkṣṇam /
ekaikaṃ hemavare śatanirvyūḍhaṃ dravati garbhe ca // VRrsṬī_8.26;9

ekaguṇasvarṇe nāgādyanyatamaṃ śataguṇanirvāhitaṃ kāryam ityarthaḥ //
VRrsṬī_8.26;11
evaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ svarṇaṃ varabījaṃ bhavati // VRrsṬī_8.26;12

atha nirvāpaṇadravyabhāgānuktisthāne taddravyasya kiyadbhāgaprakṣepaḥ
kāryastadāha kṣipediti // VRrsṬī_8.26;13

tatra bhāge dṛṣṭa ukte tu dṛṣṭavaduktabhāgamitameva tannirvāhaṇadravyam
āvāpadravyaṃ ca kṣipet // VRrsṬī_8.26;18
mṛtaṃ tarati yattoye lohaṃ vāritaraṃ hi tat // VRrs_8.27 //

mṛtalohasya bodhakānāṃ vividhapāribhāṣikaśabdānāṃ lakṣaṇānyāha mṛtamiti //
VRrsṬī_8.27;1

tallohaṃ vāritaram ucyate yanmṛtaṃ sattoye prakṣiptaṃ taratīti //
VRrsṬī_8.27;2

tadrekhāntare tayoḥ tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayoḥ rekhāntare rekhāvakāśe
aṅguṣṭhatarjanībhyāṃ gharṣaṇe kṛte yatra lauhe tayoraṅgulyoḥ rekhāsamūhaḥ
aṅkito bhavedityarthaḥ // VRrsBo_8.28;2

tallohaṃ rekhāpūrṇamucyate yanmṛtam aṅguṣṭhatarjanīmadhye saṃmarditaṃ tayoḥ
sūkṣmarekhāntaraṃ praviśediti // VRrsṬī_8.28;1
nāyāti prakṛtiṃ dhmānād apunarbhavam ucyate // VRrs_8.29 //

sukhasparśaḥ ṭaṅkaṇaṃ nirutthīkārakamitrapañcakavarge ṭaṅkaṇaśabdagrahaṇāt
yaduktaṃ rasendrasāre /
atha pūrṇamṛtaṃ talloham apunarbhavam ucyate // VRrsṬī_8.29;1

yat pratyekaṃ samabhāgair guḍādibhiḥ samastaiḥ saha miśritaṃ piṇḍīkṛtaṃ
mūṣāmadhye prakṣipya dhmānena prakṛtiṃ pūrvāvasthām āmalohabhāvaṃ na
prāpnuyāditi // VRrsṬī_8.29;2

athottamākhyamṛtalohalakṣaṇamāha yadvā pūrṇamṛtaṃ yallohaṃ vāritaraṃ
svapṛṣṭha upanītaṃ dhānyaṃ dhārayati // VRrsṬī_8.30;1

tatra lohe taddhānyaṃ kathaṃ tarati tadupamayāha yathā jale
haṃsaviśeṣāstaranti tadvat tathā dhānyabhārasahaṃ tanmṛtaloham uttamam iti
nāmnā śāstre kīrtitam // VRrsṬī_8.30;3
atra bahuṣu pustakeṣu ūnamaṃ parikīrtitam ityapi pāṭhaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.30;4

tasya svayam ūnam ūnabhāraṃ laghvapi yallohaṃ svāpekṣayā gurudravyaṃ
gurudhānyaṃ vā māti sahata iti vyutpattyā kliṣṭārthabodhakaḥ sa pāṭho
nātipriyaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.30;5
raupyeṇa saha saṃyuktaṃ dhmātaṃ raupyeṇa cel laget /
tadā nirutthamityuktaṃ lohaṃ tad apunarbhavam // VRrs_8.31 //

raupyaṃ lauhaṃ ca ekatra saṃsthāpya bhastrayā dhmāpanena yadi parasparaṃ
miśrībhavet tadāpi nirutthaṃ jñeyam // VRrsBo_8.31;2

saṃyuktaṃ melāpakamadhvājyaṃ dattvā mūṣāyāṃ saṃyojitaṃ na laget na
sajjetaikībhāvaṃ na prāpnuyād ityarthaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.31;2
tadā lohaṃ nirutthaṃ syādanyathā sādhayetpunaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.31;4

pūrvanirdiṣṭasādhyalohe
tattallohamārakānyalohanikṣeparūpanirvāhaṇākhyasaṃskāraviśeṣeṇa yadā
sādhyalohaṃ prakṣiptalauhavarṇaṃ bhavet tadā mṛdulaṃ sukhasparśaṃ
citrasaṃskāram āhitāpūrvaguṇāntaraṃ tat bījamiti jñeyam // VRrsBo_8.32;2

atha jāraṇāsaṃskāre prakṣepārhasya bījasya lakṣaṇamāha nirvāhaṇeti //
VRrsṬī_8.32;1

nirvāhyate prakṣepeṇaikīkriyate +aneneti vyutpattyā nirvāhaṇaśabdena
nirvāhakaṃ dravyaṃ grāhyam // VRrsṬī_8.32;2

prakṣepeṇa guṇaviśeṣotpādanapūrvakaikībhāvasāmānyācca tena śabdena
vāpanadravyasyāpi saṃgrahaḥ kāryaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.32;3

tena nirvāhaṇena nirvyūḍhaṃ yadbījopādānarasalohādi tattadvarṇaṃ
nirvāhaṇadravyasya samānavarṇaṃ śāstranirdiṣṭavarṇaṃ ca bhavati //
VRrsṬī_8.32;5

vāpanadravyeṇa mṛdu ca bhavettathā sattvabhasmotpādakavidhibhyāṃ ca
prāptamārdavam // VRrsṬī_8.32;6

tathā kṛto vicitrasaṃskāro garbhadrāvako raktavargakaṣāye niṣecanarūpo
melāpakadravyasaṃyogādiśca yasyetyevaṃguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ rasaśāstre
siddhabījamityabhidhīyate // VRrsṬī_8.32;7
bījaṃ dvividhaṃ pītaṃ sitaṃ ceti bhedāt // VRrsṬī_8.32;8

yaddhi khanisambhūtaṃ śuddhaṃ svarṇaṃ rajataṃ vā tad akṛtrimam //
VRrsṬī_8.32;11

yattu
dhāturasoparasasaṃyogakriyāviśeṣajanitasvarṇarajatotpādanayogyatāsaṃpannaṃ
pītaṃ svarṇarītyādi śvetaṃ vaṅgādi tatkṛtrimam ityācakṣate //
VRrsṬī_8.32;12

tatra tatkalpitaśabdavācyaṃ yacchuddharasoparasaśuddhamāritaṃ mithaḥ
saṃyuktaṃ miśraṃ vā lohādidvaṃdvīkṛtam ekaikaṃ sattvakaraṇavidhinā
nirvāhaṇena dvaṃdvamelāpakavidhinā ca militaṃ śuddhaṃ jātamārdavaṃ tad
evaikībhāvaṃ vrajati ca raktādivargeṣu secanena prāptavarṇaṃ
rañjitasaṃjñakaṃ bhavati // VRrsṬī_8.32;18

nirvāhaṇena hemaśeṣakṛtaṃ tāraśeṣakṛtaṃ vā yadbījaṃ bhūdharayantrādiṣu
puṭitaṃ tatpakvabījaṃ vadanti // VRrsṬī_8.32;19
evaṃ cedamuktalakṣaṇaṃ sarvabījānāṃ saṃgrāhakaṃ bodhyam // VRrsṬī_8.32;20

atra rasoparasānāṃ śodhanaṃ tu sūryāvartādigaṇena kuryāt //
VRrsṬī_8.32;21

sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ patraṃ ca lavaṇakṣārāmlaravisnuhīkṣīrair liptaṃ dhmātaṃ
paścānnirguṇḍīrase bahuvāraṃ niṣecitaṃ sacchudhyati // VRrsṬī_8.32;23

nāgavaṅgaghoṣatāmrāṇi tu prataptāni nirguṇḍīrasasekais
tanmūlarajaḥpravāpaiśca śudhyanti // VRrsṬī_8.32;24

sarvo+api lohaḥ pratapto mākṣīkadaradavāpena bahuvāraṃ kṛtena śudhyati //
VRrsṬī_8.32;25
idaṃ saṃsṛṣṭalohayor ityādinā vakṣyamāṇarūpam ityarthaḥ // VRrsBo_8.33;2

parisādhanaṃ dhmānenāvaśeṣakārakaṃ yadvaṅkanālena pradhmātaṃ prakarṣeṇa
dhmānaṃ kriyate tadrasaśāstre tāḍanaśabdena kathitam // VRrsṬī_8.34;2

yathā ghoṣādvaṅgaṃ vināśya tāmrasyāvaśeṣārthaṃ dhmānaṃ tacca gārākoṣṭhyāṃ
kāryam // VRrsṬī_8.34;3

kṣāraḥ ṭaṅkaṇaṃ lauhaśodhakatvāt amlaḥ kāñjikādikaṃ drāvakaḥ
guñjāṭaṅkaṇamadhvājyaguḍāḥ drāvakapañcakāḥ ityuktasvarūpaḥ taiḥ //
VRrsBo_8.36;2
sāraḥ sthirāṃśaḥ prasādabhāga iti yāvat // VRrsBo_8.36;4

matsyādipiṇḍīdravyaṃ ca tadyuktaṃ tena piṇḍīkṛtaṃ rasoparasādi dravyam //
VRrsṬī_8.36;7

tatrokte yogye koṣṭhe koṣṭhayantre +aṅgārakoṣṭhyādau ca mūṣāyāṃ prakṣipya
yadā bhastrāvaṅkanālādinā dhmātaṃ syāttadā tato dravyād dravarūpo yaḥ sāro
nirgacchati pṛthagākāreṇa nipatati tatsattvamucyate // VRrsṬī_8.36;10

koṣṭhikāyantrāgrabhāgaparyantam aṅgārairāpūrya dhmāpanavaśāt māraṇīyadravyaiḥ
mūṣākaṇṭhaparyantamāgataiḥ upalakṣito yat karma ekakolīsakākhyaḥ kriyāviśeṣo
mataḥ // VRrsBo_8.37;2

atha dhmānakriyāyā mānaviśeṣajñānārthaṃ kṛtāyāḥ kolīsakasaṃjñāyā lakṣaṇamāha
koṣṭhikāśikhareti // VRrsṬī_8.37;1

śikharaparyantaṃ paripūrṇakokilānāṃ dhmānena mūṣākaṇṭhaparyantaṃ yadāpacayo
bhavati tāvaddhmānasyaikakolīsaka iti saṃjñā // VRrsṬī_8.37;2
drāvaṇe sattvapāte ca mādhukāḥ khādirāḥ śubhāḥ /
durdrāve vaṃśajāste tu svedane bādarāḥ śubhāḥ // VRrs_8.38 //
samākṛṣṭo raso yo +asau hiṅgulākṛṣṭa ucyate // VRrs_8.39 //
vidyādharayantraṃ dvividhaṃ nirjalaṃ sajalaṃ ca // VRrsṬī_8.39;2

tatra prathamaṃ kanakasundaraprabhṛtirasānām ūrdhvabhāge puṭanārtham
upayujyate // VRrsṬī_8.39;3

yattu dvitīyam uttānapātraghaṭitaṃ tadatra vidyādharaśabdena grāhyam //
VRrsṬī_8.39;5
muktaraṅgaṃ hi tattāmraṃ ghoṣākṛṣṭam udāhṛtam // VRrs_8.40 //
atra tālaḥ svalpaśabdena kāṃsyasya caturthāṃśena grāhyaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.40;3

raṅgasya tāmrātpṛthagbhūtvā vināśārthaṃ tadupayogo bodhyaḥ //
VRrsṬī_8.40;4

atra viśeṣyapadollekhābhāve +api varanāga iti saṃjñābalādeva
tīkṣṇanīlāñjanopetamityatra nāgamiti viśeṣyapadaṃ śeṣaḥ bodhyaḥ //
VRrsBo_8.41;2

tīkṣṇalauhanīlāñjanasaṃyuktaṃ yat sīsakaṃ bahuvāraṃ dṛḍham ādhmātaṃ sat
sukomalaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ drutadrāvaṃ ca syāt tat sīsakaṃ varanāgaṃ bodhyam //
VRrsBo_8.41;3

tīkṣṇamiti pṛthak pāṭhe nīlāñjanaṃ tīkṣṇalauhaṃ ca ityarthaḥ //
VRrsBo_8.41;4

samabhāganīlāñjanasaṃyutaṃ tīkṣṇalohaṃ samabhāgena ṭaṅkaṇaṃ dattvāndhamūṣāyāṃ
dṛḍhaṃ dhmātaṃ sadyadā nāgāpekṣayāpyatimṛdu kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ śīghradrāvaṃ ca
bhavettadaitad varanāgam ucyate // VRrsṬī_8.41;2

mṛdukṛṣṭaṃ drutadrāvamiti pāṭhe dhmātvā mūṣātaḥ kṛṣṭaṃ bahirākṛṣṭaṃ śītaṃ
sadapi saṃjātamārdavam agniyogena śīghradrāvaṃ ca bhavedityarthaḥ //
VRrsṬī_8.41;5
nāgādvaraṃ śreṣṭham etad varanāgam iti // VRrsṬī_8.41;6

asyopayogaṃ tvasthirāṇāṃ kharparādisattvānāṃ sthirīkaraṇārthaṃ pūjyapādā
udājahrū rasasāre // VRrsṬī_8.41;8

tatprakārastu dvitīyādhyāye+atra rasakasattvavidhivyākhyāyāṃ prakāśita eva //
VRrsṬī_8.41;9
nāgaṃ nīlāñjanopetamiti pāṭhastu prāmādika eva // VRrsṬī_8.41;10
sattvānāṃ hi sthirīkaraṇe nāgasyānupayogāditi bodhyam // VRrsṬī_8.41;11

pāradarasoparasalohādīnām atimūrchitānāṃ prākṛtaguṇakriyāsahitānāṃ vā
punarudbhūtiḥ punaḥ pūrvavat sthānāpannatvam utthāpanam ityabhidhīyate //
VRrsṬī_8.42;2
drutadravyasya nikṣepo drave taḍḍhālanaṃ matam // VRrs_8.43 //

yathā varalohakavidhau satīkṣṇatāmrasya dhmānena drutasya lakucadrāve
nikṣepo+atrādhyāye prāguktaḥ sa ḍhālanaśabdena paribhāṣyate //
VRrsṬī_8.43;2
itthaṃ hi capalaḥ kāryo vaṅgasyāpi na saṃśayaḥ // VRrs_8.46 //
sa raso dhātuvādeṣu śasyate na rasāyane /
ayaṃ hi kharvaṇākhyena lokanāthena kīrtitaḥ // VRrs_8.48 //
kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ hi tatproktaṃ dhautākhyaṃ rasavādibhiḥ // VRrs_8.49 //
tat capalībhūtaṃ nāgaṃ vaṅgaṃ ca // VRrsBo_8.49;4

bhūnāgamalarasaiḥ tanmalamiśrajalairvā pariśodhitamalādikaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ
capalībhūtaṃ nāgaṃ vaṅgaṃ ca dhautanāgaṃ dhautavaṅgaṃ ca proktam iti
niṣkarṣaḥ // VRrsBo_8.49;5

etasyopayogastu kharasattvotpādanārthaṃ pañcamādhyāye prāgabhihita eva //
VRrsṬī_8.49;4

saṃsṛṣṭadravyadvayaṃ mardayitvā dhmāpanena dvandvānasaṃjñā jāyate //
VRrsBo_8.50;2
dvandvānam ityatra bandhanam iti pāṭhāntaram // VRrsBo_8.50;3
dravairvā vahnikāgrāso bhañjanī vādibhir matā // VRrs_8.51 //

varṇena suvarṇa iva tasmin varṇasuvarṇake rājapittale bhāgāt
māraṇārthanirdiṣṭaprakṣepyabhāgam apekṣya dravyādhikakṣepaṃ dravyāṇāṃ
prakṣepyadravyāṇām adhikakṣepam adhikaprakṣepam anu paścād
adhikaprakṣepānantaram ityarthaḥ yaḥ vahnikāgrāsaḥ
māraṇīyadravyagatavahninirvāpaṇaṃ vāthavā dravair jalādibhiḥ yaḥ
vahnikāgrāsaḥ sa bhañjanīti saṃjñayā vādibhiḥ rasavādibhiḥ matā kathitā //
VRrsBo_8.51;2

anuvarṇasuvarṇake hīnavarṇasuvarṇe hemakṛṣṭiṃ dattvā śatāṃśavidhinā
raktapītavarṇotkarṣārthaṃ yatamānena sādhakena pramādātkāraṇāntareṇa vā yadā
rūpyasya yo bhāgaḥ śāstra uktastaṃ vihāya pramāṇāpekṣayādhikaḥ kṣipyate
tādṛśakṣepaṃ kṛtvā yadā varṇikāhrāse prāgavasthitapītavarṇasyāpi hrāsaḥ
kṣayo bhavati // VRrsṬī_8.51;2

athavā dravyair vedhādāvanupadiṣṭadravyair vaṅganīlāñjanādibhiḥ saṃmīlanenāpi
yo varṇikāhrāsaḥ sā rasaśāstre bhañjanīti kathyate // VRrsṬī_8.51;3
samutthitaṃ ca bahuśaḥ sā kṛṣṭī hematārayoḥ // VRrsṬī_8.51;5

rasadaradādīnāṃ puṭena mṛtaṃ yacchulbaṃ tattāre nirvāhitaṃ kuryāt //
VRrsṬī_8.51;10

tatra nirvyūḍhatārabhāgasyādhikakṣepeṇānu varṇasuvarṇe varṇanāśaḥ spaṣṭa eva
// VRrsṬī_8.51;13
pataṅgīkalkato jātā lohe tāre ca hematā /
dināni katicitsthitvā yātyasau cullakā matā // VRrs_8.52 //

pataṅgīkalkataḥ pataṅgīkalkāntar ityarthaḥ katiciddināni sthitvā lauhaṃ tāraṃ
ceti śeṣaḥ tatra lauhe viśeṣataḥ tāre ca yā hematā svarṇasādṛśyaṃ jātā asau
hematā cullakā yāti cullakā iti saṃjñāṃ labhate ityarthaḥ iti matā //
VRrsBo_8.52;2

yadvā lakṣaṇadvayamidaṃ tena pataṅgītyārabhya hematā ityantena ślokārdhena
hematālakṣaṇam dinānītyādiślokārdhena ca cullakālavaṇaṃ jñeyam //
VRrsBo_8.52;4

asmin pakṣe vakṣyamāṇapataṅgīrāgākhyarañjakadravyaviśeṣasya kalkalepanena
sarvalauhe viśeṣataḥ raupye hematā iti saṃjñā jāyate // VRrsBo_8.52;5
hemno bhāvaḥ iti hematā svarṇasādṛśyam // VRrsBo_8.52;6

tathā asau lauhatārayor hematā katiciddināni sthitvā pataṅgīkalke ityāśayaḥ
cullakā yāti cullaketyākhyayā khyātiṃ yātītyarthaḥ // VRrsBo_8.52;7

pataṅgī aśuddharasoparasādikṛtabījajīrṇaḥ pāradastadghaṭito yaḥ kalkastena
jātaṃ yallohe tāmrādau gauravatejasvitvādiguṇasahitaṃ tāratvaṃ hematā vā
kiṃcitkālaparyantaṃ sthitvā naśyati sā kriyā culliketi matā //
VRrsṬī_8.52;2
yaḥ punaretaiḥ kurute karmāśuddhair bhaved rasastasya /
avyāpakaḥ pataṅgī na rase rasāyane yojyaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.52;3
mardayetsudṛḍhaṃ tāvad raso yāvad vilīyate // VRrsṬī_8.52;9
śoṣayeccātape piṣṭvā ślakṣṇaṃ kṛtvā ca dhāryate // VRrsṬī_8.52;10
asya kalkasya siddhasya bhāga ekaśca ṭaṅkaṇaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.52;11
suvarṇaṃ divyatejaḥ syāt kuṅkumād atiricyate // VRrsṬī_8.52;12

saṃprati kriyāviśeṣasiddhasyāciravināśino lohasthasya rāgasya saṃjñāmāha
rañjitāditi // VRrsṬī_8.53;1

tādṛśakalkena rañjitāllohāddhmānādiyatnena vinā kālāntare dhmānena sadyo vā
yo rāgo viniryāti viyujya nirgacchati sa pataṅgīrāgasaṃjñako rasaśāstre
khyātaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.53;3

pūrvaśloke pataṅgī ityuktam ataḥ tāmeva vivṛṇoti rañjitāditi //
VRrsBo_8.53;1

cirāddīrghakālaṃ vyāpya rañjitād vakṣyamāṇaraktādivargānyatamavargeṇa
rāgapariprāptād yasmāt kasmādapi lauhād athavā cirakālataḥ sudīrghakālaṃ
dhmānāddhmāpitād yasmāt kasmādapi rañjitalauhād yaḥ viniryāsaḥ niḥsravaḥ
sattvamiti yāvat nirgacchatīti śeṣaḥ sa pataṅgīrāgasaṃjñakaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ //
VRrsBo_8.53;2
drute dravyāntarakṣepo lohādye kriyate hi yaḥ /
sa āvāpaḥ pratīvāpas tadevācchādanaṃ matam // VRrs_8.54 //
vāpena salilasadṛśaṃ karoti mūṣāgataṃ tīkṣṇam // VRrsṬī_8.54;2
vāpo drute suvarṇe drutamāste tadrasaprakhyam // VRrsṬī_8.54;4
salilasya parikṣepaḥ so +abhiṣeka iti smṛtaḥ // VRrs_8.55 //

aṣṭanimeṣakam aṣṭavāram akṣṇor nimīlanonmīlanātmakaṃ kālaṃ viramya
dravībhavanānantaram apekṣya // VRrsBo_8.55;3
taptasyāpsu vinikṣepo nirvāpaḥ snapanaṃ ca tat // VRrs_8.56 //
pratīvāpādikaṃ kāryaṃ drute lohe sunirmale // VRrs_8.57 //
śuddhāvartas tadā jñeyaḥ sa kālaḥ sattvanirgame // VRrs_8.58 //
drāvasyonmukhatā seyaṃ bījāvartaḥ sa ucyate // VRrs_8.59 //
vahnistham eva śītaṃ yattaduktaṃ svāṅgaśītalam // VRrs_8.60 //

malaśaithilyakārakaṃ svedanena mārdave jāte antarmalānāṃ pṛthakkaraṇaṃ
vīkaraṇaṃ vā // VRrsBo_8.62;3

idānīm aṣṭādaśasaṃskārāṇāṃ krameṇa lakṣaṇamāha kṣārāmlairiti //
VRrsṬī_8.62;1

tāstu rasaratnākare parigaṇitā eva svedanādyupayogikāñjikavidhau //
VRrsṬī_8.62;5
mṛdbhāṇḍe pūritaṃ rakṣa yāvad amlatvam āpnuyāt // VRrsṬī_8.62;6
mīnākṣī caiva sarpākṣī sahadevī śatāvarī // VRrsṬī_8.62;7
triphalā girikarṇī ca haṃsapādī ca citrakam /
samūlaṃ kaṇḍayitvā tu yathālābhaṃ niveśayet // VRrsṬī_8.62;8
meṣaśṛṅgī citrakaṃ ca navasāraṃ samaṃ samam /
etat samastaṃ vyastaṃ vā pūrvāmlenaiva peṣayet // VRrsṬī_8.62;13
tanmadhye nikṣipet sūtaṃ baddhvā pacyād dinatrayam // VRrsṬī_8.62;14
prakṣālya kāñjikaiḥ soṣṇaistam ādāya vimardayet // VRrsṬī_8.62;15
śithilānām eva hi teṣām mocayitum śakyatvāt // VRrsṬī_8.62;19

dvādaśa doṣāśca viṣaṃ vahnir malaśceti naisargikāstrayaḥ //
VRrsṬī_8.62;20

iti sapta kañcukākhyā ityevaṃ dvādaśa doṣā devaiḥ prārthitamaheśvareṇa pārade
saṃyojitā bhavanti // VRrsṬī_8.62;26

uditairauṣadhaiḥ tatra tatroktabheṣajadravyāṇāṃ svarasaiḥ kvāthairvā
ityarthaḥ // VRrsBo_8.63;2

tathā kāñjikairapi pāradasya yatpeṣaṇaṃ tridinaparyantaṃ kṛtaṃ tad
bahirmalavināśanaṃ bhavati // VRrsṬī_8.63;4

bahirmalaḥ svedenāntarviśliṣṭo bhūtvā pāradadehādbahiḥ saṃśliṣṭo rāgato
naisargikadoṣaṃ vihāya navavidho yo malastadvināśako bhavatīti //
VRrsṬī_8.63;5

kevalaṃ svedamardanābhyāṃ na sarvathā bhujakañcukadoṣanāśanaṃ bhavati //
VRrsṬī_8.63;6

ato mardanapūrvakam agniyogena nāśaṃ kṛtvā pāradasya yat piṣṭatvotpādanaṃ
tanmūrchanasaṃskāranāmnāha mardanādiṣṭeti // VRrsṬī_8.64;1

mardanārthaṃ vakṣyamāṇamūrchanasaṃskāravidhau kathitair gṛhakanyādibhir
naṣṭapiṣṭatvakārakaṃ yat karma mardanapūrvakapācanarūpaṃ tanmūrchanam
ityabhidhīyate // VRrsṬī_8.64;2

samāsato lakṣaṇaṃ tu dattagrāsasya grāsarahitasya vā gālanapātanavyaktirekeṇa
pūrvāvasthāpannatvam // VRrsṬī_8.64;3

tacca mardanapākābhyāṃ bhavatīti mardanottaraṃ yantrapuṭānyatareṇa
pāko+apyaṅgatvena bodhya iti dvau yaugikau // VRrsṬī_8.64;4
te ca kañcukā āvarakāḥ sapta doṣā vaṅgāhidoṣapramukhāḥ // VRrsṬī_8.64;6

doṣāṇāṃ nānātvena vividhadṛḍhaśithilasaṃsargatāratamyena tannāśārthaṃ
vividhopāyapradarśanam ucitam eveti na mardanasaṃskāreṇa mūrchanasya
gatārthateti śaṅkyamiti bhāvaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.64;10

tanmūrchanaṃ hi vaṅgāhibhūjakañcukanāśanam iti pāṭhaṃ gṛhītveyaṃ vyākhyā //
VRrsṬī_8.64;11

doṣatrayavināśanamiti pāṭhe tu naisargikadoṣanāśe sutarāṃ bahirdoṣanāśa
ityabhiprāyaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.64;12

ata evāyaṃ pāṭho rasahṛdayaṭīkāyāṃ caturbhujamiśritair ādṛtaḥ //
VRrsṬī_8.64;13

naisargikadoṣetaradoṣāṇāṃ vāraṇāya pūrvoktamardanasaṃskāro
naisargikadoṣavāraṇāyāyam iti vyavasthāyāḥ sukaratvāt // VRrsṬī_8.64;14

evaṃ ca vaṅgāhibhūjakañcukanāśanam iti pāṭho na manorama iti bodhyam //
VRrsṬī_8.64;15

etattu rasam uddiśya uktaṃ dhātvantarāṇām api svasvadoṣanāśanam iti ādipadena
bodhyam // VRrsBo_8.64;6

svedaḥ ūrdhvapātanādinā svedanam ātapaḥ raudrasaṃtāpaḥ ādinā mardanādīnām
grahaṇam // VRrsBo_8.65;2
svedaḥ kāñjikayā kṣārāmlalavaṇaiśca dolāyantre svedanam // VRrsṬī_8.65;2

ātapayogaḥ kāñjikādimarditarasasya kācapātre sūryatāpasthe dhāraṇam //
VRrsṬī_8.65;3

ādiśabdena sāgnikacullīsthe kaṭāhe vā pāradasya tasya dhāraṇamityādi //
VRrsṬī_8.65;4

tena pāradasya mūrchitasya yaccāñcalyatejasvitvagauravaviśiṣṭatvarūpam
ātmarūpaṃ tatpratiprāpaṇaṃ tadutthāpanam ityucyate // VRrsṬī_8.65;5
svarūpasya vināśena piṣṭatvād bandhanaṃ hi tat /
vidvadbhirnirjitaḥ sūto naṣṭapiṣṭiḥ sa ucyate // VRrs_8.66 //

piṣṭam iṣṭabhaiṣajyaiḥ peṣaṇaṃ piṣṭamiti bhāvoktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ //
VRrsBo_8.66;2

tattvāt svarūpasya vināśena svakīyaśubhratvacapalatvādirūpāpāyena yad
rūpāpādanam iti śeṣastad bandhanaṃ vahninānucchidyamānatvaṃ mūrtibaddhatvam
iti vā jñeyam iti śeṣaḥ // VRrsBo_8.66;3
asyaiva naṣṭapiṣṭir iti saṃjñāntaramāha vidvadbhiriti // VRrsBo_8.66;4

nirjito bandhanena naṣṭasvarūpaḥ yadvā nirjito mṛtaḥ sa sūtaḥ vidvadbhir
naṣṭapiṣṭir ucyate // VRrsBo_8.66;5

vakṣyamāṇapātanavidhau nirdiṣṭatriphalādibheṣajaiḥ saha marditapāradasya tata
ūrdhvapātanādiyantrasthitasya yanniryāpaṇam ūrdhvādhastiryakprāpaṇaṃ tat
pātanam ucyate // VRrsṬī_8.67;2

tena vaṅganāgajā yaugikadoṣā bhūjādisaptakañcukāśca sarvathā naśyanti //
VRrsṬī_8.67;3
sthitir āsthāpanī kumbhe yāsau rodhanamucyate // VRrs_8.68 //

jalasaindhavābhyāṃ saha kumbhamadhye divasatrayaṃ rasasya yā āsthāpanī ā
samyak sthāpanī ṣaṇḍhadoṣanāśanapūrvakaṃ svavīrye sthāpanakāriṇī kriyeti
śeṣaḥ asau sthitiḥ sthāpanaṃ rodhanamityucyate // VRrsBo_8.68;2

idaṃ hi svedanādikriyājanitakadarthanena ṣaṇḍhabhāvaprāptasya rasasya
taddoṣanāśapūrvakavīryaprakarṣādhānārthaṃ jñātavyam // VRrsBo_8.68;3
granthāntare +asya bodhanam iti saṃjñā nirdiṣṭā // VRrsBo_8.68;4

atra saindhavamayamūṣāsaṃpuṭitaṃ kṛtvaikaviṃśatidinaparyantaṃ bhūdharapuṭanaṃ
sṛṣṭyambujaiḥ saha mardanaṃ ca kṛtvā tataḥ param iti vākyaśeṣo bodhyaḥ //
VRrsṬī_8.68;4
kriyate pārade svedaḥ proktaṃ niyamanaṃ hi tat // VRrs_8.69 //

yadyapyatra svedanārthaṃ dravyanirdeśo na kṛtaḥ tathāpi adhyetṝṇāṃ
vijñānārthaṃ granthāntaroktaṃ tannirdiśyate tathā ca rasendracintāmaṇau
/
dinaṃ saṃsveditaḥ sūto niyamāt sthiratāṃ vrajet // VRrsBo_8.69;3

svedaḥ pāradagarbhitamūṣāṃ bhūmimadhye gūḍhāṃ kṛtvā bhūmyupari karīṣāgnir
ityarthaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.69;2
grāsārthaṃ tridinaṃ svedo dīpanaṃ tanmataṃ budhaiḥ // VRrs_8.70 //
svedaḥ dolāyantre kāñjikādinā rasasya iti śeṣaḥ // VRrsBo_8.70;3
dīpanaṃ jāyate samyak sūtarājasya jāraṇe // VRrsBo_8.70;6
athavā citrakadrāvaiḥ kāñjike tridinaṃ pacet // VRrsBo_8.70;7

ghaṭamadhyago ghaṭayantramadhyagaḥ pāradastridinaparyantaṃ svedyo bhavati
yasmin karmaṇi tad dīpanam iti khyātam // VRrsṬī_8.70;6

atha jāraṇāyām ayathābalam ayathākramaṃ ca grāsadānenājīrṇadoṣāt pārade
vikriyā syād iti grāsamānavicāro+avaśyaṃ kāryaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.70;7

iyanmānasya etāvatparimāṇasya sūtasya saṃbandhavivakṣayā ṣaṣṭhī iyanmite sūte
ityarthaḥ yā iyatī mitiḥ etāvatparimāṇaṃ bhojyadravyāṇām iti śeṣaḥ iti
ucyate bhojyadravyātmikā grasanīyasvarṇādidravyāṇāṃ mānanirdeśarūpā asau
uktiḥ grāsamānaṃ samīritam iyanmānaḥ sūtaḥ iyanmānaṃ svarṇādidravyaṃ
grasituṃ samarthaḥ evaṃrūpamānanirdeśaḥ grāsamānaṃ jñeyam //
VRrsBo_8.71;2

tādṛśamānamitapāradasyeyaccatuḥṣaṣṭyaṃśādimitābhrakasattvabījādyātmakaṃ
dravyaṃ bhakṣaṇāya dattaṃ cet sukhena cīrṇaṃ jīrṇaṃ ca syāditi niścitā yā
bījāder mitis tadgrāsamānaṃ khyātam // VRrsṬī_8.71;3
grāsasya cāraṇaṃ garbhe drāvaṇaṃ jāraṇaṃ tathā /
iti trirūpā nirdiṣṭā jāraṇā varavārttikaiḥ // VRrs_8.72 //

grāsasya grāsayogyasya svarṇāderityarthaṃ cāraṇaṃ rasāntaḥ kṣepaṇaṃ garbhe
drāvaṇaṃ rasāntaḥ taralībhavanaṃ jāraṇaṃ viḍayantrādiyogena
dravībhūtagrāsasya pākaḥ // VRrsBo_8.72;2

atha jāraṇāṃ lilakṣayiṣuḥ prathamaṃ sādhāraṇāṃstadavasthābhedān salakṣaṇān
samāsata āha grāsasyeti // VRrsṬī_8.72;1

śreṣṭhai rasavārttākuśalaiḥ sarvavidhā jāraṇā trirūpā triprakārā kathitā
bhavati // VRrsṬī_8.72;2
grāsaḥ piṇḍaḥ pariṇāmastisraścākhyāḥ parā punaḥ // VRrs_8.73 //
jāraṇāyā aparaṃ traividhyamāha grāsa iti // VRrsBo_8.73;1

grāsaḥ kavalīkaraṇarūpajāraṇā piṇḍaḥ kardamavat piṇḍībhavanarūpajāraṇā //
VRrsBo_8.73;2

punarapi jāraṇāyā avasthākṛtanāmāntarāṇi trīṇyāha grāsaḥ piṣṭiḥ parīṇāmaśceti
// VRrsṬī_8.73;1

piṣṭiḥ svedanamardanāgnyādibhiḥ pāradodare drutagrāsasya pāradasahitasya
śuṣkaścūrṇaḥ // VRrsṬī_8.73;3
samukhā nirmukhā ceti jāraṇā dvividhā punaḥ // VRrs_8.74 //
nirmukhā jāraṇā proktā bījādānena bhāgataḥ // VRrs_8.75 //

niḥ nāsti mukhaṃ vakṣyamāṇacatuḥṣaṣṭyaṃśaḥ bījaprakṣeparūpamukhalakṣaṇaṃ
yatra jāraṇāyāṃ tādṛśī // VRrsBo_8.75;2

bhāgataḥ yathābhāgaṃ tattaddravyajāraṇāyāṃ nirdiṣṭabhāgam anatikramya
vakṣyamāṇacatuḥṣaṣṭibhāgāt nyūnatayā adhikatayā vā ityarthaḥ bījādānena
śuddhasvarṇaraupyātmakabījagrahaṇam // VRrsBo_8.75;4

tatrālpavaktavyatvāt prathamaṃ nirmukhāyā eva lakṣaṇamāha nirmukheti //
VRrsṬī_8.75;1

catuḥṣaṣṭibhāgamitaṃ bījaṃ prathamaṃ yatra pāradodare na dīyate kiṃtu kevalaṃ
śuddhadhātvādigrāsa eva sṛṣṭitrayanīrakaṇāvāsanauṣadhimardanādyupāyair
jāryate sā jāraṇā nirmukhetyucyate // VRrsṬī_8.75;2
